original: de ltar na gang gi phyir sgra don gyi bdag nyid dam don gyi yul na yod pa ma yin pa des na skyed par byed pa nyid med pa'i phyir dbang po'i rnam par shes pa de'i rjes su byed pa ma yin no //üîΩci ste sgra don gyi ba gnyid dam @46a * //
analyzed: de ltar na gang gi phyir sgra don gyi bdag nyid dam don gyi yul na yod pa ma yin pa des na skyed par byed pa nyid med pa'i phyir dbang po'i rnam par shes pa de'i rjes su byed pa ma yin no // ci ste sgra don gyi ba gnyid dam @46a * //
translated: Thus, because the meaning of the word does not exist in the nature of the object or in the object-field, therefore, because it is not a producer, the sense consciousness does not conform to it.

original: don gyi yul na yod pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: don gyi yul na yod pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if the meaning of the word exists in the nature of the object or in the object-field,

original: de de'i bdag nyid yin du chug kyang ste /
analyzed: de de'i bdag nyid yin du chug kyang ste /
translated: then let it be that it is of the nature of that.

original: skabs kyis de'i yul na gnas pa yang blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: skabs kyis de'i yul na gnas pa yang blta bar bya'o //
translated: But in this case, it should be seen as existing in the object-field of that.

original: gal te sgra don gang las dbang po'i rnam par shes pa skyes pa'i don de'i bdag nyid gang yin pa de ni de'i bdag nyid do//
analyzed: gal te sgra don gang las dbang po'i rnam par shes pa skyes pa'i don de'i bdag nyid gang yin pa de ni de'i bdag nyid do//
translated: If the meaning from which the sense consciousness arises is of the nature of that object, then it is of the nature of that.

original: de'i bdag nyid dam de'i yul na gnas pa yin pa de lta na yang de'i snang ba'i rjes su byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid dam de'i yul na gnas pa yin pa de lta na yang de'i snang ba'i rjes su byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Even if it is of the nature of that or exists in the object-field of that, it still does not conform to its appearance.

original: ga las she na /
analyzed: ga las she na /
translated: Why is that?

original: smras pa / sgras ni sgra 'dzin pa'i dbang po las gzhan du gyur pa'i dbang po'i shes pa skyed par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: smras pa / sgras ni sgra 'dzin pa'i dbang po las gzhan du gyur pa'i dbang po'i shes pa skyed par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Objection: Because sound is not able to generate a sense consciousness that is different from the sense faculty that apprehends sound.

original: 'di skad brjod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod par 'gyur te /
translated: This is stated as follows:

original: grangs can rnams kyi sna tshogs de tsam lnga bkod pa'i gnas pa'i bdag nyid yin pa de lta na yang sgra'i rnam par 'gyur ba ni nyan pa'i 'jug pa nyid kyi yul yin no //
analyzed: grangs can rnams kyi sna tshogs de tsam lnga bkod pa'i gnas pa'i bdag nyid yin pa de lta na yang sgra'i rnam par 'gyur ba ni nyan pa'i 'jug pa nyid kyi yul yin no //
translated: Even though the diversity of the SƒÅ·πÉkhya is the nature of the arrangement of the five elements, the transformation of sound is the object of the engagement of hearing.

original: de bzhin du gal te brda sprod pa rnams kyi don sgra'i rnam par 'gyur ba nyid yin pa de lta na yang sgrar rnam par gyur pa ni nyan pa'i dbang po'i rnam par shes pa'i rnam par gyur ba nyid kyi yul yin gyi gzhan gyi ma yin no
analyzed: de bzhin du gal te brda sprod pa rnams kyi don sgra'i rnam par 'gyur ba nyid yin pa de lta na yang sgrar rnam par gyur pa ni nyan pa'i dbang po'i rnam par shes pa'i rnam par gyur ba nyid kyi yul yin gyi gzhan gyi ma yin no
translated: In the same way, even though the meaning of the grammarians is the transformation of sound, the transformation of sound is the object of the transformation of the sense consciousness of hearing, not of anything else.

original: // de'i yul na yod pa nyid yin yang /
analyzed: // de'i yul na yod pa nyid yin yang /
translated: Even though it exists in its object,

original: rang gi dbang po'i shes pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir de nyid kyis skyed par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: rang gi dbang po'i shes pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir de nyid kyis skyed par byed pa yin no //
translated: it is generated by that itself because it is the object of one‚Äôs sense consciousness.

original: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i yang phyir ro zhes bya ba la gang yang rung ba gcig nyid kyis don thams cad 'dzin pa'i phyir rgol ba thams cad kyis nyams su myong ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas dbang po lngar brtag par byas pa gang yin pa de dor
analyzed: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i yang phyir ro zhes bya ba la gang yang rung ba gcig nyid kyis don thams cad 'dzin pa'i phyir rgol ba thams cad kyis nyams su myong ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas dbang po lngar brtag par byas pa gang yin pa de dor
translated: Because of the absurd consequence that it would be too much, the five sense faculties that were posited following the experience of all disputants would be abandoned.

original: bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ni ha cang thal ba'o //
analyzed: bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ni ha cang thal ba'o //
translated: This is the absurd consequence.

original: gang gi phyir ha cang thal ba de'i phyir nus pa ma yin no ;
analyzed: gang gi phyir ha cang thal ba de'i phyir nus pa ma yin no ;
translated: Because of the absurd consequence, it is not possible.

original: / rang gi sgra ni nus pa med pa de'i phyir 'dzin pa ma yin la /
analyzed: / rang gi sgra ni nus pa med pa de'i phyir 'dzin pa ma yin la /
translated: Because of the absence of the capacity of its own sound, it is not apprehended.

original: ha cang thal ba'i phyir yang nus pa med pa yin no zhes nus pa med pa sgrub pa'i gtan tshigs gzhan bsdu ba'i don to //
analyzed: ha cang thal ba'i phyir yang nus pa med pa yin no zhes nus pa med pa sgrub pa'i gtan tshigs gzhan bsdu ba'i don to //
translated: Because of the absurd consequence, it is also not possible. This is the meaning of the other reason proving the absence of capacity.

original: gal te rna ba'i dbang po'i rnam par shes pa sgra'i nus pa las skyes pa la sgra'i snang ba yod pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te rna ba'i dbang po'i rnam par shes pa sgra'i nus pa las skyes pa la sgra'i snang ba yod pa ma yin nam /
translated: If the auditory consciousness that arises from the capacity of sound has the appearance of sound,

original: de nas dbang po'i rnam par shes pa don gyi nus pa las skyes pa'i phyir sgra snang ba ma yin la /
analyzed: de nas dbang po'i rnam par shes pa don gyi nus pa las skyes pa'i phyir sgra snang ba ma yin la /
translated: Then, since the sensory consciousnesses arise from the potential of the object, they are not appearances of sound.

original: des na rnam par rtog pa med pa yin no zhes ci'i phyir smra zhe na /
analyzed: des na rnam par rtog pa med pa yin no zhes ci'i phyir smra zhe na /
translated: Therefore, why do you say that they are non-conceptual?

original: bden te / de lta na yang /
analyzed: bden te / de lta na yang /
translated: That is true, but

original: sgra ci 'dra ba zhig bzung bas rnam par shes pa rnam par rtog pa dang bcas bar 'gyur ba de @46b 'dra ba ni nyan pa'i rnam par shes pas ma bzung la /
analyzed: sgra ci 'dra ba zhig bzung bas rnam par shes pa rnam par rtog pa dang bcas bar 'gyur ba de @46b 'dra ba ni nyan pa'i rnam par shes pas ma bzung la /
translated: the auditory consciousness does not apprehend sound in such a way that consciousness becomes conceptual.

original: de 'dra bas bskyed pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: de 'dra bas bskyed pa yang ma yin no //
translated: Nor is it generated in such a way.

original: brjod par bya ba dang 'brel pa'i sgra gzung ba na 'dzin par byed pa rnam par rtog pa dang bcas par 'gyur te /
analyzed: brjod par bya ba dang 'brel pa'i sgra gzung ba na 'dzin par byed pa rnam par rtog pa dang bcas par 'gyur te /
translated: When sound related to an object of expression is apprehended, the apprehender becomes conceptual.

original: don 'ga' zhig don gzhan dang sbrel ba'i rnam par skyes pa ni sbyor bar byed pa yin pas rnam par rtog pa can du brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don 'ga' zhig don gzhan dang sbrel ba'i rnam par skyes pa ni sbyor bar byed pa yin pas rnam par rtog pa can du brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is said to be conceptual since it arises in the aspect of some object related to another object.

original: des na phan tshun 'brel pa'i don 'dzin pa nyid rnam par rtog pa can yin no //
analyzed: des na phan tshun 'brel pa'i don 'dzin pa nyid rnam par rtog pa can yin no //
translated: Therefore, the apprehension of an object related to another object is conceptual.

original: gcig gis du ma 'dzin pa tsam ni 'brel pa nyid du 'dzin pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gcig gis du ma 'dzin pa tsam ni 'brel pa nyid du 'dzin pa ma yin te /
translated: The mere apprehension of many by one is not the apprehension of a relation,

original: bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa shes pa gcig la snang yang sbyar nas 'dzin pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa shes pa gcig la snang yang sbyar nas 'dzin pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because a pot, a cloth, etc., appear to one cognition, but are not apprehended as being connected.

original: gzhan yang khyad par du bya ba dang khyad par du byed pa'i dngos por 'dzin pa ni sbyar nas 'dzin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan yang khyad par du bya ba dang khyad par du byed pa'i dngos por 'dzin pa ni sbyar nas 'dzin pa ma yin no //
translated: Moreover, the apprehension of a thing as qualified and a thing as qualifier is not the apprehension of a connection.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rnam par shes pa thams cad bdag nyid don gzhan dang sbyar nas mi 'dzin pa'i phyir bdag nyid la rtog pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rnam par shes pa thams cad bdag nyid don gzhan dang sbyar nas mi 'dzin pa'i phyir bdag nyid la rtog pa med pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, because all consciousnesses do not apprehend themselves as connected with another object, they are without conception of themselves.

original: don la 'ga' zhig sbyar nas 'dzin pa de ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa yin la /
analyzed: don la 'ga' zhig sbyar nas 'dzin pa de ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa yin la /
translated: That which apprehends an object as connected with something else is with conception.

original: gzhan ni rnam par rtog pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan ni rnam par rtog pa med pa yin no //
translated: The other is without conception.

original: de'i phyir rnam par shes pa gang zhig sgra las don dang sbyar nas rjod par byed pa nyid du 'dzin pa de nyid rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam par shes pa gang zhig sgra las don dang sbyar nas rjod par byed pa nyid du 'dzin pa de nyid rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, that consciousness which is apprehended as expressing itself by connecting the meaning with the sound is itself with conception.

original: don dang 'brel pa'i sgra yang brda dang ldan pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: don dang 'brel pa'i sgra yang brda dang ldan pa nyid yin te /
translated: Also, a sound that is related to an object is endowed with a sign.

original: des na brda'i dus su mthong ba de nyid ni 'di nyid yin no zhes sngon mthong ba nyid du gzung ba na sgra don dang 'brel par gzung bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des na brda'i dus su mthong ba de nyid ni 'di nyid yin no zhes sngon mthong ba nyid du gzung ba na sgra don dang 'brel par gzung bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, when one grasps that which was seen previously as ‚ÄúThat is this very thing that was seen at the time of the sign,‚Äù one grasps the relation between the sign and the object. Otherwise, one does not.

original: sngon mthong ba yang sngon skyes pa'i shes pa'i yul nyid yin la /
analyzed: sngon mthong ba yang sngon skyes pa'i shes pa'i yul nyid yin la /
translated: Moreover, that which was seen previously is the object of a consciousness that arose previously.

original: de yang sngon gyi shes pa dang lhan cig tu 'das pa yin te /
analyzed: de yang sngon gyi shes pa dang lhan cig tu 'das pa yin te /
translated: And that also has passed away together with the previous consciousness.

original: phyis ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: phyis ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not exist later.

original: rang bzhin yod pa'i sgra ni skyed par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: rang bzhin yod pa'i sgra ni skyed par byed pa yin la /
translated: A sound that has an intrinsic nature is a producer.

original: mngon sum yang rang bzhin yod pa'i yul can yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum yang rang bzhin yod pa'i yul can yin no //
translated: And direct perception has an object that has an intrinsic nature.

original: des na rnam par shes pa ni rjod par byed pa brda'i yul nyid kyis bskyed pa ma yin la /
analyzed: des na rnam par shes pa ni rjod par byed pa brda'i yul nyid kyis bskyed pa ma yin la /
translated: Therefore, consciousness is not produced by the object of a sign that is an expression.

original: de snang ba yang ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de snang ba yang ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: And it does not appear.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni don gyi mthus bskyed pa dang don tsam snang ba yin no //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni don gyi mthus bskyed pa dang don tsam snang ba yin no //
translated: An auditory consciousness is produced by the power of an object, and it appears as just the object.

original: de'i phyir rnal 'byor pa'i shes ba la sgra don du ma snang du zin kyang rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid de /
analyzed: de'i phyir rnal 'byor pa'i shes ba la sgra don du ma snang du zin kyang rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid de /
translated: Therefore, even though many meanings appear as the object of a yogi‚Äôs consciousness, it is still nonconceptual.

original: rjod par byed pa sngon gyi shes pa'i yul nyid kyis ma bskyed cing de snang ba yang ma yin pa'i phyir te /üîΩde @47a * //
analyzed: rjod par byed pa sngon gyi shes pa'i yul nyid kyis ma bskyed cing de snang ba yang ma yin pa'i phyir te / de @47a * //
translated: This is because it is not generated by the object of a prior consciousness that expresses it, nor does it appear as that.

original: ni de'i tshe 'das pas med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ni de'i tshe 'das pas med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because at that time the prior consciousness has ceased.

original: des na gal te sgra rang gi mtshan nyid rjod par byed pa yin pa de lta na yang /
analyzed: des na gal te sgra rang gi mtshan nyid rjod par byed pa yin pa de lta na yang /
translated: Therefore, even if a sound‚Äôs specific characteristic is what is expressed,

original: rjod par byed pa'i tshul gyis 'ga' zhig gis skyed par byed pa'am gzung bar bya ba cha yin no //
analyzed: rjod par byed pa'i tshul gyis 'ga' zhig gis skyed par byed pa'am gzung bar bya ba cha yin no //
translated: it is not generated by it in the manner of being expressed, nor is it a part of it that is apprehended.

original: de'i phyir rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / rnal 'byor pa'i shes pa dang / yid kyi shes pa'i mngon sum thams cad sgra 'dzin par byed pa yin yang sngon gyi shes par yul rjod par byed pa'i tshul gyis bskyed pa ma yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / rnal 'byor pa'i shes pa dang / yid kyi shes pa'i mngon sum thams cad sgra 'dzin par byed pa yin yang sngon gyi shes par yul rjod par byed pa'i tshul gyis bskyed pa ma yin la /
translated: Therefore, although all direct perceptions of auditory consciousness, yogic consciousness, and mental consciousness apprehend sound, they are not generated by the object of a prior consciousness in the manner of being expressed.

original: de'i rnam pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i rnam pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor do they possess the aspect of that.

original: des na don gyi mthu las skyes pa dang de tsam snang bar brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: des na don gyi mthu las skyes pa dang de tsam snang bar brjod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is said that it arises from the power of the object and that it appears as just that.

original: des na sgra la rag ma las pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: des na sgra la rag ma las pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa med pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, because it does not depend on words, it is non-conceptual.

original: dbang po las skyes pa'i mngon sum don gzhan gyi yul can ni thams cad du sgra'i skyed byed dang / gzung ba can ma yin te /
analyzed: dbang po las skyes pa'i mngon sum don gzhan gyi yul can ni thams cad du sgra'i skyed byed dang / gzung ba can ma yin te /
translated: The direct perception that arises from the sense faculty and has an object different from itself is never produced by words and does not grasp them.

original: des na rtog pa med pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: des na rtog pa med pa nyid yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is indeed non-conceptual.

original: de'i phyir sgra'i rnam pa can dang mngon sum gzhan rnam par rtog pa'i rgyu rjod par byed pa'i rang bzhin gyis ma bskyed pa dang / de snang ba med par khyad par med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir sgra'i rnam pa can dang mngon sum gzhan rnam par rtog pa'i rgyu rjod par byed pa'i rang bzhin gyis ma bskyed pa dang / de snang ba med par khyad par med do //
translated: Therefore, the aspect of the word and the other direct perceptions are not distinguished by whether they are produced by the nature of the speaker or by the absence of their appearance.

original: 'dir ni gang gi phyir tha snyad 'dogs pa po snang ba rnam par brtag par bya ba'i don dag gcig tu byas nas sgra rang gi mtshan nyid kho na rjod par byed par lhag par zhe na pa de'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid kho na rjod par byed
analyzed: 'dir ni gang gi phyir tha snyad 'dogs pa po snang ba rnam par brtag par bya ba'i don dag gcig tu byas nas sgra rang gi mtshan nyid kho na rjod par byed par lhag par zhe na pa de'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid kho na rjod par byed
translated: Here, because the speaker, having made the appearing objects of the conceptualization into one, has the strong intention to express only the word's own characteristic, therefore it expresses only the own characteristic.

original: par khas blangs nas /
analyzed: par khas blangs nas /
translated: Vasubandhu accepts that.

original: de'i rnam pa dang bral bas mngon sum rnam par rtog pa med par bsgrubs pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i rnam pa dang bral bas mngon sum rnam par rtog pa med par bsgrubs pa yin no //
translated: But since it is devoid of the aspect of that, it is established as nonconceptual direct perception.

original: gang dag rjod par byed pa ni sgra'i spyi yin la /
analyzed: gang dag rjod par byed pa ni sgra'i spyi yin la /
translated: Those who say that the general characteristic of sound is the object of verbalization,

original: de yang dbang po'i shes pa la mi snang ba yin par snang ba de dag gi ltar na dbang po'i byed pa med pa la zhes bya ba la sogs pa de dang rtog pa med par bsgrubs pa'i skabs 'di khyad par med par brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: de yang dbang po'i shes pa la mi snang ba yin par snang ba de dag gi ltar na dbang po'i byed pa med pa la zhes bya ba la sogs pa de dang rtog pa med par bsgrubs pa'i skabs 'di khyad par med par brjod pa yin te /
translated: and that it does not appear to the sense consciousness, for them this passage, ‚ÄúIf it is not the object of the sense faculties,‚Äù and so on, is the same as the passage that establishes the absence of conception,

original: yul brjod pa'i sgo nas de rtog pa med pa grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yul brjod pa'i sgo nas de rtog pa med pa grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the absence of conception is established by way of the object being verbalized.

original: gzhan yang 'dir yi ge la de lta bu'i don med pas yi ge'i don du mi snang bar bshad par 'gyur ro ;
analyzed: gzhan yang 'dir yi ge la de lta bu'i don med pas yi ge'i don du mi snang bar bshad par 'gyur ro ;
translated: Moreover, since such an object does not exist for letters, it is explained that it does not appear as the object of letters.

original: / gal te snang ba'i rgyu don las skyes pa gang yin pa de snang ba nges pa'i phyir rtog pa med pa yin na /
analyzed: / gal te snang ba'i rgyu don las skyes pa gang yin pa de snang ba nges pa'i phyir rtog pa med pa yin na /
translated: If the cause of appearance is that which arises from the object, since that is ascertained as appearance, it is nonconceptual.

original: 'o na gzhan gang zhig rnam par rtog pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba snang ba nges pa med pa'i rnam par shes pa gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na gzhan gang zhig rnam par rtog pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba snang ba nges pa med pa'i rnam par shes pa gang yin zhe na /
translated: Well then, what is the consciousness that is not definite with regard to the appearance, which is conceptual?

original: rnam par rtog pa can zhes smos so //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa can zhes smos so //
translated: It is the one that is called ‚Äúconceptual.‚Äù

original: ni'i sgra ni yid kyi @47b rnam par shes pa mngon sum las khyad par du bstan pa'i don to //
analyzed: ni'i sgra ni yid kyi @47b rnam par shes pa mngon sum las khyad par du bstan pa'i don to //
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù is for the purpose of distinguishing the mental consciousness from the direct perception.

original: khyad par de nyid bstan pa'i don du bshad pa don gyi nus pa ni mthu'o //
analyzed: khyad par de nyid bstan pa'i don du bshad pa don gyi nus pa ni mthu'o //
translated: The explanation is for the purpose of teaching that very distinction. The power of the object is its capacity.

original: de nye ba ni byed pa dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: de nye ba ni byed pa dang bcas pa'o //
translated: Its proximity is its being present.

original: de la mi ltos pa ni de la ltos pa med pa ste /
analyzed: de la mi ltos pa ni de la ltos pa med pa ste /
translated: Not depending on that is not depending on it.

original: ji ltar dbang po'i shes pa bzhin du snang ba don la rag las pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ji ltar dbang po'i shes pa bzhin du snang ba don la rag las pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that, like the sense consciousness, the appearance does not depend on the object.

original: des na snang ba don la rag ma las pa yin pa'i phyir dbang po'i don yang de yin la ma nges pa yang yin pa de 'dzin pa ste snang ba nges pa med pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: des na snang ba don la rag ma las pa yin pa'i phyir dbang po'i don yang de yin la ma nges pa yang yin pa de 'dzin pa ste snang ba nges pa med pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Therefore, because the appearance does not depend on the object, the object of the sense faculty is that, and it is indefinite. The meaning is that the apprehension of that is the indefinite appearance.

original: snang ba dang rnam par brtag pa'i don dag gcig tu byas pa'i phyir yid kyi rnam par shes ba la dbang po'i don 'dzin par brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: snang ba dang rnam par brtag pa'i don dag gcig tu byas pa'i phyir yid kyi rnam par shes ba la dbang po'i don 'dzin par brjod pa yin te /
translated: The object of the sense faculty is said to be apprehended by mental consciousness because the appearance and the object of the conception are made into one.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'dir rang gi mtshan nyid kho na rjod par byed par bzung nas rtog pa med par sgrub par 'dod do zhes khong du chud pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'dir rang gi mtshan nyid kho na rjod par byed par bzung nas rtog pa med par sgrub par 'dod do zhes khong du chud pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is understood that here, taking only the intrinsic identity to be the object of expression, it is asserted that there is no conception.

original: snang ba nges pa med pa nyid kyi phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang dngos po la sngon gyi shes pa'i yul du gyur pa nyid du 'dzin par byed de /
analyzed: snang ba nges pa med pa nyid kyi phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang dngos po la sngon gyi shes pa'i yul du gyur pa nyid du 'dzin par byed de /
translated: Because the appearance is not ascertained, mental consciousness apprehends the thing as the object of a prior cognition,

original: sngon mthong ba gang yin pa de nyid ni de yin no zhes gcig tu byas nas 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngon mthong ba gang yin pa de nyid ni de yin no zhes gcig tu byas nas 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it engages by making it one with what was seen before, thinking, ‚ÄúThat is just this.‚Äù

original: de nyid smras pa ni rnam par rtog pa can zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de nyid smras pa ni rnam par rtog pa can zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: This is what is called ‚Äúconceptual.‚Äù

original: rnam par rtog pa ni 'di nyid de /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa ni 'di nyid de /
translated: This is the conception.

original: 'di lta ste snga ma dang phyi ma mthong ba'i don dag gcig tu byed pa'o zhes brda dran pa'i thabs kyis su zhes bya ba 'di'i nang du 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di lta ste snga ma dang phyi ma mthong ba'i don dag gcig tu byed pa'o zhes brda dran pa'i thabs kyis su zhes bya ba 'di'i nang du 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: For example, it is like the fact that the meaning of what is seen in the past and future is made into one.

original: 'o na yid kyi rnam par shes pa de gang las skye zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na yid kyi rnam par shes pa de gang las skye zhe na /
translated: Now, from what does that mental consciousness arise?

original: smras pa / rnam par rtog pas rigs mthun pa'i rnam par rtog pa skyed pa'i nus pa rgyun las gzhag pa gang yin pa de ni bag chags so //
analyzed: smras pa / rnam par rtog pas rigs mthun pa'i rnam par rtog pa skyed pa'i nus pa rgyun las gzhag pa gang yin pa de ni bag chags so //
translated: It is said: That which is posited from the continuum of the potential to generate a conceptual cognition of a similar type by a conceptual cognition is a latent imprint.

original: des kun nas bslang ba ni bskyed pa ste /
analyzed: des kun nas bslang ba ni bskyed pa ste /
translated: That which is motivated by that is generated.

original: 'dis ni rnam par rtog pa'i log par 'dzin pa'i rgyu brjod do //
analyzed: 'dis ni rnam par rtog pa'i log par 'dzin pa'i rgyu brjod do //
translated: This states the cause of the mistaken apprehension of conceptual cognition.

original: gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa log par 'dzin pa'i bag chags kyis bskyed pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa log par 'dzin pa'i bag chags kyis bskyed pa yin na /
translated: If the mental consciousness is generated by the latent imprints of mistaken apprehension,

original: de lta na 'o na de la don gyi rnam pa snang ba de ga las she na /
analyzed: de lta na 'o na de la don gyi rnam pa snang ba de ga las she na /
translated: then in that case, how does the aspect of an object appear in that?

original: nyams su myong ba dang 'brel ba las zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba dang 'brel ba las zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: It is said: from the connection with experience.

original: don de dang de nyams su myong ba las don de dang de'i rnam par snang ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'di yin no //üîΩgal te de lta na don nges pa med par snang ba'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa log par goms pa dang / nyams su myong ba'i bag chags kyis bskyed pa de'i tshe thams cad la don @48a * //
analyzed: don de dang de nyams su myong ba las don de dang de'i rnam par snang ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'di yin no // gal te de lta na don nges pa med par snang ba'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa log par goms pa dang / nyams su myong ba'i bag chags kyis bskyed pa de'i tshe thams cad la don @48a * //
translated: The meaning is that the appearance of the aspect of that object is due to the experience of that object.

original: thams cad snang bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: thams cad snang bar 'gyur te /
translated: If that is so, then at the time when the mental consciousness that perceives without ascertaining the object is generated by the latent impressions of mistaken meditation and experience, all objects would appear to all consciousnesses.

original: don thams cad nyams su myong ba'i bag chags dang log pa'i bag chags nya ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes dogs pa la /
analyzed: don thams cad nyams su myong ba'i bag chags dang log pa'i bag chags nya ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes dogs pa la /
translated: Because the latent impressions of the experience of all objects and the latent impressions of error are the same.

original: 'ga' zhig dang zhes smos so //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig dang zhes smos so //
translated: In response to this qualm, the text says, ‚Äúin some cases.‚Äù

original: 'dir yang nyams su myong ba dang 'brel pa las zhes de ltar sbrel bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang nyams su myong ba dang 'brel pa las zhes de ltar sbrel bar bya'o //
translated: Here, too, the phrase ‚Äúin relation to experience‚Äù should be supplied.

original: sngar ni nyams su myong ba tsam las snang ba bskyed par brjod pa yin la /
analyzed: sngar ni nyams su myong ba tsam las snang ba bskyed par brjod pa yin la /
translated: Previously, it was said that the appearance is generated from mere experience.

original: de ltar ni khyad par 'ga' zhig gis khyad par du byas pa las brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar ni khyad par 'ga' zhig gis khyad par du byas pa las brjod pa yin no //
translated: Here, it is said that the appearance is generated from experience that is qualified by some distinction.

original: de smras pa ni lhan cig gam so sor 'dzin par byed do zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de smras pa ni lhan cig gam so sor 'dzin par byed do zhes bya ba'o //
translated: When one recalls the meaning, one recalls it either together or separately.üîΩWhen one experiences a related meaning, one recalls it as related.

original: don 'brel pa nyams su myong ba la ni 'brel par dran zhing gzhan du myong na ni gzhan du ste /
analyzed: don 'brel pa nyams su myong ba la ni 'brel par dran zhing gzhan du myong na ni gzhan du ste /
translated: When one experiences it in a different way, one recalls it as different.

original: des na nyams su myong ba'i khyad par las yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'ga' zhig nyid 'ga' zhig ltar 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: des na nyams su myong ba'i khyad par las yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'ga' zhig nyid 'ga' zhig ltar 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Thus, the mental consciousness is of a certain type due to the specific experience.

original: 'di ltar sgra dang don dag lhan cig rgyu ba goms pa ni lhan cig tu 'dzin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar sgra dang don dag lhan cig rgyu ba goms pa ni lhan cig tu 'dzin la /
translated: In this way, one who is accustomed to the simultaneous occurrence of sound and meaning grasps them together.

original: lhan cig rgyu bar ma goms pa ni so sor 'dzin to //
analyzed: lhan cig rgyu bar ma goms pa ni so sor 'dzin to //
translated: One who is not accustomed to their simultaneous occurrence grasps them separately.

original: dman pa la sogs pa'i khyad par gyis bar du gcod pa'i nyams su myong ba la yang so so nyid du 'dzin te /
analyzed: dman pa la sogs pa'i khyad par gyis bar du gcod pa'i nyams su myong ba la yang so so nyid du 'dzin te /
translated: One who experiences them in a different way, due to the specific differences of inferiority and so on, grasps them separately.

original: bag chags sad pa'i rkyen ma tshang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bag chags sad pa'i rkyen ma tshang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the conditions for the activation of the latent impressions are incomplete.

original: de'i phyir de ltar don la mi ltos pa'i phyir don nges pa med par snang bas rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i shes pa nyid brjod pa dang 'dre ba yin gyi dbang po'i rnam par shes pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar don la mi ltos pa'i phyir don nges pa med par snang bas rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i shes pa nyid brjod pa dang 'dre ba yin gyi dbang po'i rnam par shes pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, because it does not depend on an object in that way, it is the conceptual consciousness itself that is mixed with expression, not the sense consciousness, because the appearance of the object is not ascertained.

original: gal te 'di snyam du sgra dang 'brel pa'i snang ba don gzhan gyis bzhag pa yin na ni phyi rol tha dad par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir snang ba thams cad kyi phyi rol gyis byas pa ma yin par 'gyur na sgra'i snang ba ni rnam pa
analyzed: gal te 'di snyam du sgra dang 'brel pa'i snang ba don gzhan gyis bzhag pa yin na ni phyi rol tha dad par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir snang ba thams cad kyi phyi rol gyis byas pa ma yin par 'gyur na sgra'i snang ba ni rnam pa
translated: If you think that if the appearance related to sound is posited by another object, then because it does not make the external different, all appearances would not be made by the external, but the appearance of sound is of two types:

original: gnyis te / rang gi rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa can nyan pa'i rnam par shes pa dang / spyi'i rnam pa can gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: gnyis te / rang gi rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa can nyan pa'i rnam par shes pa dang / spyi'i rnam pa can gang yin pa ste /
translated: the auditory consciousness that conforms with its object and the one that does not conform with its object and the one that has a general aspect.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pas gang rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pas gang rtogs pa yin no //
translated: The mental consciousness comprehends that.

original: de la spyi'i rnam pa sgra la mi ltos pas dbang po'i shes pa la gnod pa ci yod /
analyzed: de la spyi'i rnam pa sgra la mi ltos pas dbang po'i shes pa la gnod pa ci yod /
translated: What harm is there to a sense consciousness if the general aspect does not depend on sound?

original: don gyis byas pa don la mi ltos pa nyid na skyon du 'gyur na /
analyzed: don gyis byas pa don la mi ltos pa nyid na skyon du 'gyur na /
translated: If the fault were that the meaning is not dependent on the expression,

original: 'di ni don gyis byas pa yang ma yin /
analyzed: 'di ni don gyis byas pa yang ma yin /
translated: then this would not be the case.

original: sgra ni de nyid kyi ngo bos rjod par byed pa yin /
analyzed: sgra ni de nyid kyi ngo bos rjod par byed pa yin /
translated: The sound is the expression by the nature of that.

original: khyod kyis ni sgra rang gi mtshan nyid rjod par byed par brtags nas dbang po'i rnam par shes pa gzhan la de snang ba mi 'thad par brjod do //
analyzed: khyod kyis ni sgra rang gi mtshan nyid rjod par byed par brtags nas dbang po'i rnam par shes pa gzhan la de snang ba mi 'thad par brjod do //
translated: You imagine that the sound expresses the intrinsic identity, and then you say that it is not tenable that it appears to the other, the sense consciousness.

original: des na dbang po'i rnam par shes pa don gyi nus pas bskyed pa yang yin @48b la ;
analyzed: des na dbang po'i rnam par shes pa don gyi nus pas bskyed pa yang yin @48b la ;
translated: Therefore, the sense consciousness is produced by the potentiality of the object,

original: gang las rnam par rtog pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba sgra'i rnam pa can du yang 'gyur ro zhes dogs pa la /
analyzed: gang las rnam par rtog pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba sgra'i rnam pa can du yang 'gyur ro zhes dogs pa la /
translated: and it also has the aspect of the sound, from which it becomes conceptual.

original: sgra'i spyi'i rnam pa can nyid la don gyi nus pas bskyed pa nyid mi 'thad pa rnam pa gzhan gyi sgo nas bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sgra'i spyi'i rnam pa can nyid la don gyi nus pas bskyed pa nyid mi 'thad pa rnam pa gzhan gyi sgo nas bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to show in another way that it is not tenable that it is produced by the potentiality of the object, even though it has the aspect of the universal of the sound,

original: don ni nye bar sbyor ba yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: don ni nye bar sbyor ba yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: he says, ‚ÄúThe object is applied,‚Äù and so on.

original: tshig le'ur byas pa gnyis po 'di'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: tshig le'ur byas pa gnyis po 'di'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of these two verses is as follows:

original: gal te dbang po'i rnam par shes pa sgra'i spyi'i rnam pa can du 'gyur na yang don gyi mthus bskyed par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te dbang po'i rnam par shes pa sgra'i spyi'i rnam pa can du 'gyur na yang don gyi mthus bskyed par mi 'gyur te /
translated: If the auditory consciousness were to have the aspect of the universal of sound, it would not be generated by the power of the object,

original: don dran pa bskyed pas bar chad la nye bar sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don dran pa bskyed pas bar chad la nye bar sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would be connected to the memory of the object.

original: sngar tha dad par byed pa ma yin par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir skyed par byed pa ma yin par brjod pa gang yin pa de ni spyi'i rnam par 'dzin pa la yang khyad par med par blta bar bya la /
analyzed: sngar tha dad par byed pa ma yin par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir skyed par byed pa ma yin par brjod pa gang yin pa de ni spyi'i rnam par 'dzin pa la yang khyad par med par blta bar bya la /
translated: That which is said not to generate because of the consequence of not being different previously is to be regarded as not different in the apprehension of the universal.

original: 'di yang skyon lhag pa gzhan yin no //
analyzed: 'di yang skyon lhag pa gzhan yin no //
translated: And this is another additional fault.

original: don dbang po'i rnam par shes pa bskyed pa la nye bar sbyor ba na'ang ste /
analyzed: don dbang po'i rnam par shes pa bskyed pa la nye bar sbyor ba na'ang ste /
translated: Also, when the object is connected to the generation of the sense consciousness,

original: byed pa dang ldan par khas blangs pa na /
analyzed: byed pa dang ldan par khas blangs pa na /
translated: if it is accepted as having activity,

original: gzhan yang ste yang lhag par dran pa zhes bya ba brda'i dus na yod pa'i sgra sbyar ba dran pa'i rang bzhin la'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang ste yang lhag par dran pa zhes bya ba brda'i dus na yod pa'i sgra sbyar ba dran pa'i rang bzhin la'o //
translated: then also, that is, additionally, the so-called memory, which is the nature of remembering the sound that existed at the time of the convention,

original: gal te zhes bya ba ni gal te de ltar ltos na zhes khas blang ba ston par byed pa'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba ni gal te de ltar ltos na zhes khas blang ba ston par byed pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIf‚Äù indicates that the opponent is accepting the consequence of the argument.

original: de nyid kyi phyir ci de ltar ltos par khas len nam zhes 'dri ba ni ltos na zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir ci de ltar ltos par khas len nam zhes 'dri ba ni ltos na zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúWould you accept that?‚Äù means ‚ÄúIf you accept that, then you must accept that . . .‚Äù

original: ci zhig de ltar ltos par khas blangs she na /
analyzed: ci zhig de ltar ltos par khas blangs she na /
translated: What is it that you accept as a consequence?

original: dbang po'i blo ste dbang po'i rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: dbang po'i blo ste dbang po'i rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: The cognition of the sense faculty, that is, the sense consciousness.

original: de ltar khas blangs pa la skyon ci yod ce na /
analyzed: de ltar khas blangs pa la skyon ci yod ce na /
translated: What is wrong with accepting that?

original: bshad pa / skyed par byed pa nyid du 'dod pa'i don de chod pa ste /
analyzed: bshad pa / skyed par byed pa nyid du 'dod pa'i don de chod pa ste /
translated: The response: The object that is asserted to be the producer is separated from the effect,

original: 'bras bu dbang po'i rnam par shes pa la dran pas chod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'bras bu dbang po'i rnam par shes pa la dran pas chod par 'gyur te /
translated: the sense consciousness, by memory.

original: dran pa nyid la nye bar sbyor ba'i phyir dngos su skyed par byed pa ma yin par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dran pa nyid la nye bar sbyor ba'i phyir dngos su skyed par byed pa ma yin par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The object is not the direct producer of the sense consciousness because it is connected to memory.

original: gal te 'di snyam du dbang po'i shes pa spyi'i rnam pa dang ldan du chug pa de lta na yang sgra dran pa la ltos par ci ltar 'gyur snyam na /
analyzed: gal te 'di snyam du dbang po'i shes pa spyi'i rnam pa dang ldan du chug pa de lta na yang sgra dran pa la ltos par ci ltar 'gyur snyam na /
translated: If one thinks, ‚ÄúEven if it is granted that the sense consciousness is endowed with a universal aspect, how could it depend on the memory of sound?üîΩ‚Äù

original: brda'i dus zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: brda'i dus zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The text says, ‚Äúat the time of the convention.‚Äù

original: gang gi phyir brda'i ste sgra rjod par byed pa nyid du sbyor ba de'i dus su don gang la de brda sbyar ba de la goms pa ste 'dris par byas pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir brda'i ste sgra rjod par byed pa nyid du sbyor ba de'i dus su don gang la de brda sbyar ba de la goms pa ste 'dris par byas pa'o //
translated: Because the convention, that is, the sound, is applied to the object, one becomes familiar with it, that is, one becomes accustomed to it.

original: rjod pa yang de yin la spyi yang de yin pas brjod pa'i spyi ste /
analyzed: rjod pa yang de yin la spyi yang de yin pas brjod pa'i spyi ste /
translated: It is an expression and it is a universal, thus it is the universal of the expression.

original: de ma dran bar ro //
analyzed: de ma dran bar ro //
translated: Without remembering that,

original: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: this is what is being said.

original: sgra ni spyi'i ngo bo nyid kyis rjod par byed pa yin gyi khyad par ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //üîΩde ma dran pa'i skyes bu ni don @49a * //
analyzed: sgra ni spyi'i ngo bo nyid kyis rjod par byed pa yin gyi khyad par ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'o // de ma dran pa'i skyes bu ni don @49a * //
translated: Sound is an expression by virtue of its universal nature, but not by virtue of its particular.

original: la de sbyor mi srid de /
analyzed: la de sbyor mi srid de /
translated: Without remembering that, it is impossible for a person to apply it to the object.

original: dran pa nyid kyis don khyad par can du 'dzin gyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dran pa nyid kyis don khyad par can du 'dzin gyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin no //
translated: It is only memory that apprehends the particular object, not anything else.

original: sgra gzhan bzhin no zhes bya ba ni ji ltar sgra gzhan la brda'i dus na goms pa'i spyi'i gnas pa gang yin pa de mi dran par ni sbyor bar mi srid pa de bzhin du 'di la yang ngo zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: sgra gzhan bzhin no zhes bya ba ni ji ltar sgra gzhan la brda'i dus na goms pa'i spyi'i gnas pa gang yin pa de mi dran par ni sbyor bar mi srid pa de bzhin du 'di la yang ngo zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúLike other words‚Äù means that just as in the case of other words, one cannot apply the word without remembering the universal that was learned at the time of the convention.

original: sgra gzhan zhes pa 'di ni spyi'i dbang du byas pa'i bdun pa'o //
analyzed: sgra gzhan zhes pa 'di ni spyi'i dbang du byas pa'i bdun pa'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúother‚Äù is in the seventh case, the dative.

original: 'di skad du brjod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad du brjod par 'gyur te /
translated: This is what is being said:

original: brda dang ldan pa'i sgra nyid kyis 'ga' zhig khyad par can du 'dzin gyi dngos po la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: brda dang ldan pa'i sgra nyid kyis 'ga' zhig khyad par can du 'dzin gyi dngos po la ni ma yin no //
translated: The word itself, which is associated with the convention, is apprehended as qualified, not the thing.

original: des na brda'i dus na goms pa nyid dang / dran pa ni khyab par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: des na brda'i dus na goms pa nyid dang / dran pa ni khyab par byed pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, the learning at the time of the convention and the memory are the pervader.

original: don la sgra khyad par can du 'dzin pa ni khyab par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: don la sgra khyad par can du 'dzin pa ni khyab par bya ba yin no //
translated: The apprehension of the word as qualified with respect to the thing is the pervaded.

original: 'di ltar brda dang 'brel pa med na ni sgras khyad par du byas pa'i don 'dzin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar brda dang 'brel pa med na ni sgras khyad par du byas pa'i don 'dzin pa ma yin no //
translated: Because if there is no connection with the convention, the word does not apprehend the thing as qualified.

original: gzhan du na brda rig pa dang gzhan thams cad sgra thams cad kyis don thams cad khyad par can du 'dzin par 'gyur na 'dzin pa yang ma yin no//
analyzed: gzhan du na brda rig pa dang gzhan thams cad sgra thams cad kyis don thams cad khyad par can du 'dzin par 'gyur na 'dzin pa yang ma yin no//
translated: Otherwise, all words would be apprehended as having all meanings, as in the case of the science of signs.

original: des na ldog pa dang rjes su 'gro ba dag las nges pa dang ldan pa nyid kyis khyad par can du 'dzin pa la ni brda goms pa dang dran pa dag gis khyab pa yin te /
analyzed: des na ldog pa dang rjes su 'gro ba dag las nges pa dang ldan pa nyid kyis khyad par can du 'dzin pa la ni brda goms pa dang dran pa dag gis khyab pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, the apprehension of a word as having a particular meaning is pervaded by the familiarity with and memory of the word, because of the certainty that comes from positive and negative concomitance.

original: khyab par byed pa med pa na khyab par bya ba ldog pa yang sgra gzhan la mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyab par byed pa med pa na khyab par bya ba ldog pa yang sgra gzhan la mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: And when there is no pervasion, the absence of the pervader is seen in other words.

original: khyad par can du 'dzin pa dang brda goms pa dang dran pa'i khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang dngos po ma yin pa'i phyir grags pas byas pa yin par bstan pa'i don du sgra gzhan no zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: khyad par can du 'dzin pa dang brda goms pa dang dran pa'i khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang dngos po ma yin pa'i phyir grags pas byas pa yin par bstan pa'i don du sgra gzhan no zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: The nature of the pervaded and the pervader in the apprehension of a word as having a particular meaning, and in the familiarity with and memory of the word, is not real, so another word is mentioned in order to show that it is merely conventional.

original: 'di snyam du gal te dran pa nyid kyis khyad par can du 'dzin pa de ltar na yang don chod par ni mi 'gyur ro snyam na /
analyzed: 'di snyam du gal te dran pa nyid kyis khyad par can du 'dzin pa de ltar na yang don chod par ni mi 'gyur ro snyam na /
translated: If you think that even if it is apprehended as qualified by memory, it will not serve the purpose,

original: don zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: don zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: he says, ‚Äúthe object,‚Äù

original: don de ste yul gyi nye bar sbyor ba rung ba'i yul na gnas pa ste /
analyzed: don de ste yul gyi nye bar sbyor ba rung ba'i yul na gnas pa ste /
translated: that is, the object that is suitable to be connected to the object, which is present in the object.

original: gang du gnas pas dbang po'i shes pa skyed par byed pa'o //
analyzed: gang du gnas pas dbang po'i shes pa skyed par byed pa'o //
translated: It is present in the object, and it generates a sense consciousness.

original: des byas pa'i nang gi dngos po ni nang gi rnam par 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: des byas pa'i nang gi dngos po ni nang gi rnam par 'gyur ba ste /
translated: The internal state that is produced by that is the internal state.

original: sgra dran pa'i bag chags sad pa de la med na'o //
analyzed: sgra dran pa'i bag chags sad pa de la med na'o //
translated: If the sound does not exist in the activation of the latent propensities of memory,

original: sgra nyid de las gzhan pa las bye brag tu gyur pa yin pas na khyad par te /
analyzed: sgra nyid de las gzhan pa las bye brag tu gyur pa yin pas na khyad par te /
translated: it is a particular, that is, it is different from that.

original: khyad par can gyi rjod par byed pa'i sgra de la dran par mi rigs so //
analyzed: khyad par can gyi rjod par byed pa'i sgra de la dran par mi rigs so //
translated: It is not reasonable that memory is of that sound that expresses the particular.

original: nges pa nyid du zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: nges pa nyid du zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: The meaning is that it is certain.

original: 'di skad brjod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod par 'gyur te /
translated: This is what is said:

original: rtag tu skye bar thal ba'i phyir dran pa de nyid med pa can ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rtag tu skye bar thal ba'i phyir dran pa de nyid med pa can ni ma yin no //
translated: Because it would follow that memory would always arise, it is not that memory is without that.

original: rgyu de yang don las gzhan yin na ni nges pa @49b 'gar yang mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: rgyu de yang don las gzhan yin na ni nges pa @49b 'gar yang mi 'gyur la /
translated: If the cause were different from the object, it would never be ascertained.

original: rung ba ma yin pa'i yul na gnas pa'i don kyang rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: rung ba ma yin pa'i yul na gnas pa'i don kyang rgyu ma yin te /
translated: And the object that is not a suitable object does not cause memory,

original: rtag tu dran par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtag tu dran par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow, absurdly, that one would always remember it.

original: de'i phyir dran pa'i nus pa sad pa'i rgyu ni rung ba'i yul na gnas pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir dran pa'i nus pa sad pa'i rgyu ni rung ba'i yul na gnas pa nyid yin no //
translated: Therefore, the cause that awakens the potency of memory is the object that is a suitable object.

original: yang gi sgras ni sgra'i spyi dran pa dang / rung ba'i yul na gnas pa'i don gyis byas pa 'di gnyi ga la gdon mi za bar brten par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di ston par byed do //
analyzed: yang gi sgras ni sgra'i spyi dran pa dang / rung ba'i yul na gnas pa'i don gyis byas pa 'di gnyi ga la gdon mi za bar brten par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di ston par byed do //
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù indicates that both the memory of the universal of sound and the object that is a suitable object are definitely to be relied upon.

original: des byas pa nyid la gdon mi za bar ltos pa zhes bya ba 'di ga las she na /
analyzed: des byas pa nyid la gdon mi za bar ltos pa zhes bya ba 'di ga las she na /
translated: Why is it that it definitely relies on that which is produced?

original: de nges byas pa ma yin na zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de nges byas pa ma yin na zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It is because it says, ‚ÄúIf it were not produced by that . . .‚Äù

original: don gzhan gang yang rung ba 'ga' zhig gis dran pa yin na ni mthong ba'i don gyi ming gang yin pa de nges pa nyid du 'dzin par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: don gzhan gang yang rung ba 'ga' zhig gis dran pa yin na ni mthong ba'i don gyi ming gang yin pa de nges pa nyid du 'dzin par mi 'gyur te /
translated: If it were a memory of any other object whatsoever, then the name of the object that was seen would not be ascertained.

original: ma bzung ba nyid du thal bar 'gyur na nges pa nyid du de bzung nas sbyor ba de'i phyir nges pa nyid kyis de'i ming dran pa ni des byas pa yin no zhes bya bar gnas so //
analyzed: ma bzung ba nyid du thal bar 'gyur na nges pa nyid du de bzung nas sbyor ba de'i phyir nges pa nyid kyis de'i ming dran pa ni des byas pa yin no zhes bya bar gnas so //
translated: It follows that it would not apprehend it, but it definitely does apprehend it, and it is connected with it. Therefore it is established that the memory of its name is produced by it.

original: gang gi phyir dbang po'i blo ni dran pa la ltos la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir dbang po'i blo ni dran pa la ltos la /
translated: Because the cognition of the sense faculty depends on memory,

original: dran pa'i bag chags sad pa yang rung ba'i yul na 'dug pa'i don kho nas byas pa yin pa de'i phyir don gyi nye bar sbyor ba ni byed pa dang bcas pa ste byed pa dang bcas pa nyid la nye bar sbyor bar brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dran pa'i bag chags sad pa yang rung ba'i yul na 'dug pa'i don kho nas byas pa yin pa de'i phyir don gyi nye bar sbyor ba ni byed pa dang bcas pa ste byed pa dang bcas pa nyid la nye bar sbyor bar brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and the arousal of the latent impressions of memory is produced by the object that is present, therefore the connection with the object is with the one that has an action, because it is said that the connection is with the one that has an action.

original: ji lta bur gnas pa'i don 'ga' zhig rgyu yin par mthong ba de lta bu'i gnas lugs 'dzin pa de nyid rang gi 'bras bu la nye bar sbyor ba yin la /
analyzed: ji lta bur gnas pa'i don 'ga' zhig rgyu yin par mthong ba de lta bu'i gnas lugs 'dzin pa de nyid rang gi 'bras bu la nye bar sbyor ba yin la /
translated: Whatever object in whatever state is seen to be the cause, the apprehension of that very state is the connection with its own effect.

original: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las rung ba'i yul na 'dug pa'i don yang dbang po'i shes pa skye bar mthong ba yin pa de'i phyir de'i yul 'dzin pa nyid shes pa de la sbyor ba yin no //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las rung ba'i yul na 'dug pa'i don yang dbang po'i shes pa skye bar mthong ba yin pa de'i phyir de'i yul 'dzin pa nyid shes pa de la sbyor ba yin no //
translated: And from the fact that it is present when the object is present and absent when the object is absent, it is seen that the sense consciousness arises in regard to the object. Therefore, the apprehension of that object is connected with that consciousness.

original: nye bar sbyor ba de'i de ma thag pa ste bar ma chod pa'i byed pa'i 'bras bu gang yin pa de ltar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nye bar sbyor ba de'i de ma thag pa ste bar ma chod pa'i byed pa'i 'bras bu gang yin pa de ltar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The immediately antecedent condition of that connection is not the effect of the dominant condition.

original: 'di byed pa dang ldan pa ni yin na byed pa'i 'bras bu bar du ma chod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di byed pa dang ldan pa ni yin na byed pa'i 'bras bu bar du ma chod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Although it has the dominant condition, it is not the effect of the dominant condition without interval.

original: dran pa ste dran par byed pa'i shes pas de bar du chod cing bskal pa ste /
analyzed: dran pa ste dran par byed pa'i shes pas de bar du chod cing bskal pa ste /
translated: The memory, the consciousness that produces memory, is the interval, the eon.

original: don de ni dran pa bskyed pa nyid la dngos su sbyor ba des na dbang po'i shes pa des bar du bcad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don de ni dran pa bskyed pa nyid la dngos su sbyor ba des na dbang po'i shes pa des bar du bcad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That object is directly connected with the production of memory itself, because it is interrupted by that memory.

original: gal te de ltar gyur du zin na cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar gyur du zin na cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If that were so, what would follow?

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, he says:

original: gang gi phyir don de dran pas bar du chod pa de'i phyir te //
analyzed: gang gi phyir don de dran pas bar du chod pa de'i phyir te //
translated: Because that object is interrupted by memory,

original: bar du chod pa'i rgyus gang sngon te sngar skyed par byed pa ma yin pa de ni phyis kyang 'gyur ro zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: bar du chod pa'i rgyus gang sngon te sngar skyed par byed pa ma yin pa de ni phyis kyang 'gyur ro zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: that which is not a cause of that which is interrupted, which is produced earlier, is not a cause of that which is produced later.

original: gal te skad cig so @50a * //üîΩso tha dad pa'i phyir snga ma yang gzhan la /
analyzed: gal te skad cig so @50a * // so tha dad pa'i phyir snga ma yang gzhan la /
translated: If it is argued:

original: phyi ma yang gzhan ma yin nam /
analyzed: phyi ma yang gzhan ma yin nam /
translated: Since each moment is different, is it not the case that the former is different and the latter is also different?

original: de'i phyir de dag grub ba dang bde ba gcig par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir de dag grub ba dang bde ba gcig par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Therefore, how could they be the same in terms of establishment and pleasure?

original: nyer sbyor khyad par med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: nyer sbyor khyad par med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: It is said: because there is no difference in application.

original: tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no difference.

original: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: This is what is said:

original: gal te skad cig rnams tha dad pa de lta na yang rung ba'i yul na gnas pa nyid kyis de dag skyed par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: gal te skad cig rnams tha dad pa de lta na yang rung ba'i yul na gnas pa nyid kyis de dag skyed par byed pa yin la /
translated: If the moments are different, it is suitable that they produce that which is to be produced by merely abiding in the proper place.

original: rung ba'i yul na gnas pa nyid kyang thams cad la khyad par yod pa ma yin pas skad cig ma snga ma bzhin du rang bzhin des dran pa'i rgyur nye bar sbyor ba yin no //
analyzed: rung ba'i yul na gnas pa nyid kyang thams cad la khyad par yod pa ma yin pas skad cig ma snga ma bzhin du rang bzhin des dran pa'i rgyur nye bar sbyor ba yin no //
translated: And the fact that it is present in a suitable place does not make any difference to all of them, so it is applied as a cause of memory just like the previous moment.

original: gtan tshigs 'dis thams cad kyang skyed par byed pa nyid du grub pa dang bde ba gcig pa yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs 'dis thams cad kyang skyed par byed pa nyid du grub pa dang bde ba gcig pa yin no //
translated: By this reasoning, it is established that all of them are producers and have the same nature.

original: gal te 'di snyam du snga ma dang phyi ma'i skad cig rnams skyed par byed pa dang mi byed pas khyad par yod na 'gal ba ci yod snyam na bshad pa /
analyzed: gal te 'di snyam du snga ma dang phyi ma'i skad cig rnams skyed par byed pa dang mi byed pas khyad par yod na 'gal ba ci yod snyam na bshad pa /
translated: If you think, ‚ÄúIf there is a difference between the earlier and later moments in that some produce and some do not, what is the contradiction?‚Äù

original: skad cig ma thams cad bdag nyid tha dad pa med bas so //
analyzed: skad cig ma thams cad bdag nyid tha dad pa med bas so //
translated: We say: because all moments are not different from themselves.

original: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las dbang po'i shes pa skyed par nus pa ni rung ba'i yul na gnas pa'i bdag nyid yin par mthong la /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las dbang po'i shes pa skyed par nus pa ni rung ba'i yul na gnas pa'i bdag nyid yin par mthong la /
translated: From the perspective of positive and negative concomitance, the capacity to produce a sense consciousness is seen to be the nature of being present in a suitable place.

original: de yang tshogs par byed pa'i rgyu rnams kyis yul der bskyed pa yin te /
analyzed: de yang tshogs par byed pa'i rgyu rnams kyis yul der bskyed pa yin te /
translated: And that is produced in that place by the causes that assemble it.

original: de lta bur gyur pa'i bdag nyid kyis skyed par byed pa ni rgyu dang rang gi ngo bo la khyad par med pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa'i bdag nyid kyis skyed par byed pa ni rgyu dang rang gi ngo bo la khyad par med pa yin no //
translated: The cause and its nature are not different.

original: des na phan tshun nye bar tshogs pa'i rten du gyur pa rkyen gyi khyad par rnams kyis ji ltar skad cig ma snga ma dbang po'i shes pa bskyed par bya ba la dngos su skyed par byed pa nyid dam /
analyzed: des na phan tshun nye bar tshogs pa'i rten du gyur pa rkyen gyi khyad par rnams kyis ji ltar skad cig ma snga ma dbang po'i shes pa bskyed par bya ba la dngos su skyed par byed pa nyid dam /
translated: Thus, the specific conditions that are the basis for the mutual collection of the causes and conditions are the direct producers of the prior moment of consciousness that produces the sense consciousness.

original: dran pa'i bar chad byas pas brgyud pas skyed par byed par byas kyang rung ste /
analyzed: dran pa'i bar chad byas pas brgyud pas skyed par byed par byas kyang rung ste /
translated: Or, they are the indirect producers of the sense consciousness because they prevent the interruption of memory.

original: de bzhin du skad cig ma thams cad kyang yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du skad cig ma thams cad kyang yin no //
translated: In the same way, all moments are also like that.

original: 'di la 'bras bu skyed pa la ji snyed kyi rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su rtogs pa de srid kyi tshogs pa nyid rgyu yin gyi so so ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di la 'bras bu skyed pa la ji snyed kyi rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su rtogs pa de srid kyi tshogs pa nyid rgyu yin gyi so so ni ma yin no //
translated: In this regard, the collection of causes is the cause to the extent that it is the object of the subsequent realization of the forward and reverse processes in the production of the effect. It is not the individual members of the collection that are the cause.

original: tshogs pa yang tshogs pa can dag las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir de dag so so la nus par brjod pa yin te ;
analyzed: tshogs pa yang tshogs pa can dag las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir de dag so so la nus par brjod pa yin te ;
translated: And because the collection is not different from the members of the collection, the individual members are said to have the ability to produce the effect.

original: dper na mig gi rnam par shes pa la mig la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na mig gi rnam par shes pa la mig la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like the eye faculty and so on in relation to the eye consciousness.

original: de la re zhig mig gi shes ba bskyed par nus pa'i rang gi ngo bo res 'ga' ba ni rang gi rgyun tsam las skyes par mi rigs so //
analyzed: de la re zhig mig gi shes ba bskyed par nus pa'i rang gi ngo bo res 'ga' ba ni rang gi rgyun tsam las skyes par mi rigs so //
translated: First, it is not reasonable that the occasional intrinsic nature capable of producing the eye consciousness arises from the mere continuum of the eye faculty itself.

original: gang gi phyir ji ltar sgron ma la sogs pa'i me lce tsam la rag las nas 'od 'byung ba @50b bzhin du /
analyzed: gang gi phyir ji ltar sgron ma la sogs pa'i me lce tsam la rag las nas 'od 'byung ba @50b bzhin du /
translated: Because just as light arises in dependence on the mere flame of a lamp and so on,

original: mig tsam la rag las nas mig gi rnam par shes pa skye bar 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: mig tsam la rag las nas mig gi rnam par shes pa skye bar 'gyur ba'am /
translated: the eye consciousness arises in dependence on the mere eye faculty.

original: ji ltar sa bon khyad par la rag las nas myu gu skye ba ltar mig gi khyad par la rag las pa yin grang /
analyzed: ji ltar sa bon khyad par la rag las nas myu gu skye ba ltar mig gi khyad par la rag las pa yin grang /
translated: Or just as a sprout arises in dependence on a particular seed, it arises in dependence on a particular eye faculty.

original: mig tsam la rag las pa yin na ni dus thams cad du de'i shes pa skye bar thal bar 'gyur te ;
analyzed: mig tsam la rag las pa yin na ni dus thams cad du de'i shes pa skye bar thal bar 'gyur te ;
translated: If it arises in dependence on the mere eye faculty, then it would follow that its consciousness would arise at all times,

original: me lce la rag las nas 'byung ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bzhin no //
analyzed: me lce la rag las nas 'byung ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bzhin no //
translated: like the circle of light that arises in dependence on the flame.

original: mig gi khyad par la rag las pa yin yang khyad par de gang las 'byung bar brjod par bya /
analyzed: mig gi khyad par la rag las pa yin yang khyad par de gang las 'byung bar brjod par bya /
translated: Though it depends on the special features of the eye, one must say from what those special features arise.

original: gal te rang gi rgyun tsam las yin na ni rgyu de las byung bar khyad par med pa'i phyir snga ma'i skad cig ma rnams kyang de skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin du thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te rang gi rgyun tsam las yin na ni rgyu de las byung bar khyad par med pa'i phyir snga ma'i skad cig ma rnams kyang de skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin du thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: If they arise from the mere continuum of the eye, then since there is no difference from the cause, it follows that the former moments would also have the nature of producing the eye consciousness.

original: skyed par byed par 'dod pa'i skad cig ma de'i khyad par de yang rgyu med pa can ni ma yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: skyed par byed par 'dod pa'i skad cig ma de'i khyad par de yang rgyu med pa can ni ma yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because the special features of that moment that is asserted to be the producer are not causeless.

original: 'on kyang rang gi rgyud las byung ba yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang rang gi rgyud las byung ba yin no //
translated: However, they arise from its own continuum.

original: 'di snyam du 'bras bu 'ga' zhig la 'ga' zhig ni dngos su nus pa yin la /
analyzed: 'di snyam du 'bras bu 'ga' zhig la 'ga' zhig ni dngos su nus pa yin la /
translated: If you think that some causes are directly able to produce some effects,

original: kha cig ni brgyud pas yin no //
analyzed: kha cig ni brgyud pas yin no //
translated: while others are indirectly able to produce some effects,

original: de la 'dod pa'i skad cig ma ni dngos su nus pa yin zhing /
analyzed: de la 'dod pa'i skad cig ma ni dngos su nus pa yin zhing /
translated: then the asserted moment is directly able to produce the eye consciousness,

original: skad cig ma snga ma rnams ni brgyud pas yin no snyam na //
analyzed: skad cig ma snga ma rnams ni brgyud pas yin no snyam na //
translated: while the former moments are indirectly able to produce it.

original: de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: That is illogical.

original: gang gi phyir rgyud gcig las byung ba nyid du khyad par med pa'i phyir tha ma bzhin du thams cad kyang dngos su skyed bar nus par thal bar 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rgyud gcig las byung ba nyid du khyad par med pa'i phyir tha ma bzhin du thams cad kyang dngos su skyed bar nus par thal bar 'gyur ba'am /
translated: Because there is no difference in their arising from the same continuum, it follows that all moments of the seed are able to directly produce the sprout, just as the final moment of the seed does.

original: tha ma yang snga ma rnams bzhin du dngos su skyed pa'i nus pa med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tha ma yang snga ma rnams bzhin du dngos su skyed pa'i nus pa med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Or else, it follows that the final moment of the seed is not able to directly produce the sprout, just as the prior moments of the seed were not.

original: rgyud gcig las byung ba yin yang skad cig gi dbye ba las 'bras bu'i dbye ba yin par yang mi rigs te /
analyzed: rgyud gcig las byung ba yin yang skad cig gi dbye ba las 'bras bu'i dbye ba yin par yang mi rigs te /
translated: Even if they arise from the same continuum, it is illogical to say that the differences in the effect are due to the differences in the moments.

original: gang gi phyir rgyun chags pa can gyi mig gi rnam par shes pa skye ba na mig gi skad cig rnams phan tshun tha dad pa yin yang /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rgyun chags pa can gyi mig gi rnam par shes pa skye ba na mig gi skad cig rnams phan tshun tha dad pa yin yang /
translated: Because when the eye consciousness that is part of a continuum arises, the moments of the eye sense faculty are mutually different.

original: rgyu dang rkyen gyi rgyun khyad par med pas 'bras bu gcig byed par mthong ngo //
analyzed: rgyu dang rkyen gyi rgyun khyad par med pas 'bras bu gcig byed par mthong ngo //
translated: However, since there is no difference in the continuum of causes and conditions, it is seen that they produce a single effect.

original: de bzhin du tshogs pa khyad par med pa nyid kyis sa bon tha dad pa yin yang 'bras bu mtshungs pa med par mthong ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshogs pa khyad par med pa nyid kyis sa bon tha dad pa yin yang 'bras bu mtshungs pa med par mthong ngo //
translated: In the same way, even though the seeds are different, it is seen that they produce the same effect, because the collection of causes is not different.

original: de'i phyir gang zhig tha dad kyang tha dad par mi 'gyur ba de ni des byas pa ma yin pa'am /
analyzed: de'i phyir gang zhig tha dad kyang tha dad par mi 'gyur ba de ni des byas pa ma yin pa'am /
translated: Therefore, that which is different but is not different is not produced by that.

original: gzhan la ltos pa yin te /
analyzed: gzhan la ltos pa yin te /
translated: Or else, it depends on another.

original: dper na sa bon tha dad kyang du ba tha dad par mi 'gyur ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na sa bon tha dad kyang du ba tha dad par mi 'gyur ba bzhin no //
translated: For example, although the seeds are different, the smoke is not different.

original: skad cig tha dad kyang 'bras bu tha dad par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: skad cig tha dad kyang 'bras bu tha dad par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Although the moments are different, the effect is not different.

original: des na tha dad pa ni skad cig tha dad pa'i rjes su byed pa ma yin @51a * //
analyzed: des na tha dad pa ni skad cig tha dad pa'i rjes su byed pa ma yin @51a * //
translated: Therefore, difference does not follow upon the difference of the moments.

original: no ; /'bras bu rgyud tha dad pa'i rjes su byed ba la ni nam yang 'khrul pa yod ba ma yin no //
analyzed: no ; /'bras bu rgyud tha dad pa'i rjes su byed ba la ni nam yang 'khrul pa yod ba ma yin no //
translated: But when the effect follows upon the difference of the stream, there is never any error.

original: gal te de ltar na skyes bu'i rgyud la 'phos pa'i byi ba'i dug la yang skad cig dang po 'chi ba'i nus pa yod par 'gyur ba'am yang na phyis dus yongs su gtugs pa la ltos par yang mi 'gyur ro snyam na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar na skyes bu'i rgyud la 'phos pa'i byi ba'i dug la yang skad cig dang po 'chi ba'i nus pa yod par 'gyur ba'am yang na phyis dus yongs su gtugs pa la ltos par yang mi 'gyur ro snyam na /
translated: If that is so, then the poison of a rat that has been transferred to the stream of a person would have the power to kill in the first moment, or else it would not depend on the lapse of time.

original: de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: That is not reasonable.

original: dug des ni skyes bu'i rgyud la nus pa bskyed pa yin zhing de yang skyes bu'i rgyud tsam la ltos nas de'i 'bras bu la nus pa ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang dus kyi ming can 'byung ba chen po'i khyad par gyis yongs su smin par byas ba
analyzed: dug des ni skyes bu'i rgyud la nus pa bskyed pa yin zhing de yang skyes bu'i rgyud tsam la ltos nas de'i 'bras bu la nus pa ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang dus kyi ming can 'byung ba chen po'i khyad par gyis yongs su smin par byas ba
translated: The poison produces a potency in the mindstream of the person, and that potency is not the result of that poison in dependence on the mindstream of the person alone, but rather it is fully ripened by a special great element called time.

original: yin no // des na sngar na skyes bu'i rgyud dngos su nus pa med pa las phyis ni nus ba'i skad cig rnams 'byung ba chen po'i lhan cig byed pa la ltos pa dang bcas pa'i rgyun de las skyes pa yin gyi /
analyzed: yin no // des na sngar na skyes bu'i rgyud dngos su nus pa med pa las phyis ni nus ba'i skad cig rnams 'byung ba chen po'i lhan cig byed pa la ltos pa dang bcas pa'i rgyun de las skyes pa yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, previously, the mindstream of the person did not have the potency, but later, the moments of potency arise in dependence on the cooperating causes, the great elements, and they arise from the continuum,

original: 'ba' zhig las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'ba' zhig las ni ma yin no //
translated: but not from just that.

original: 'dis ni sems kyi khyad par la ltos pa'i dgos pa'i dug gis skyes bu'i lus gzung ba yang bshad la /
analyzed: 'dis ni sems kyi khyad par la ltos pa'i dgos pa'i dug gis skyes bu'i lus gzung ba yang bshad la /
translated: This explains that the body of the person is grasped by the poison of the special need that depends on the mind,

original: nyi ma'i 'od la ltos pa'i 'bru mar dag las dri'i khyad par 'byung ba yang bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: nyi ma'i 'od la ltos pa'i 'bru mar dag las dri'i khyad par 'byung ba yang bshad pa yin no //
translated: and it explains that the special smell arises from the oil in dependence on the light of the sun.

original: 'ga' zhig tu rgyud gzhan gyis rgyud gzhan la dus la ltos pa'i dus 'ba' zhig skyed na yang /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig tu rgyud gzhan gyis rgyud gzhan la dus la ltos pa'i dus 'ba' zhig skyed na yang /
translated: In some cases, if a continuum generates a mere temporal state in another continuum that is dependent on time,

original: der yang dang po'i skad cig nus pa med pa yin na bzhi pa yang nus pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro zhes brgal zhing brtag pa 'di bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: der yang dang po'i skad cig nus pa med pa yin na bzhi pa yang nus pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro zhes brgal zhing brtag pa 'di bya ba ma yin te /
translated: then even in that case, if the first moment lacks potency, the fourth moment would not possess potency.

original: gang gi phyir rgyud gzhan kho nas rgyud gzhan la skad cig ma bzhi tsam gyi bar du chod pa'i 'bras bu skyed pa'i nus pa bzhag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rgyud gzhan kho nas rgyud gzhan la skad cig ma bzhi tsam gyi bar du chod pa'i 'bras bu skyed pa'i nus pa bzhag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is not a critique, because the potency to generate an effect that is separated from another continuum by just four moments is posited in terms of another continuum.

original: rgyud gzhan de ni rang gis dngos su nus pa ma yin zhing /
analyzed: rgyud gzhan de ni rang gis dngos su nus pa ma yin zhing /
translated: That other continuum is not directly potent.

original: dngos su nus pa'i rgyud gzhan skyed par byed pa yang ma yin gyi 'on kyang skad cig gsum bzhir sdod pa la ltos pa nyid do //
analyzed: dngos su nus pa'i rgyud gzhan skyed par byed pa yang ma yin gyi 'on kyang skad cig gsum bzhir sdod pa la ltos pa nyid do //
translated: It is not that it generates another continuum that is directly potent, but rather it is dependent on abiding for three or four moments.

original: rgyud gcig dang 'brel pa'i nus pa la ni 'jog par byed pa nges par byed pa po'i rgyud gzhan med pa'i phyir skyon yin par brjod do //
analyzed: rgyud gcig dang 'brel pa'i nus pa la ni 'jog par byed pa nges par byed pa po'i rgyud gzhan med pa'i phyir skyon yin par brjod do //
translated: It is said that the error is that there is no other continuum that is the agent that posits the potency that is related to a single continuum.

original: yang don 'ga' zhig ni rgyud gzhan gyis phan par byas pa'i rgyun las 'bras bu 'ba' zhig byed par nus pa yin te /
analyzed: yang don 'ga' zhig ni rgyud gzhan gyis phan par byas pa'i rgyun las 'bras bu 'ba' zhig byed par nus pa yin te /
translated: Also, some effects are produced only from a continuum that is benefited by another continuum.

original: dper na sa bon bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na sa bon bzhin no //
translated: For example, this is like a seed.

original: de'i phyir 'bras bu bskyed par bya ba la rgyud gcig tu gtogs pa gzhan rnams ni nus pa med la /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'bras bu bskyed par bya ba la rgyud gcig tu gtogs pa gzhan rnams ni nus pa med la /
translated: Therefore, in the production of an effect, other things that belong to the same continuum are not capable of producing it.

original: skad cig ma 'ga' zhig dngos su nus pa ni rgyud gzhan la ltos par @51b rigs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: skad cig ma 'ga' zhig dngos su nus pa ni rgyud gzhan la ltos par @51b rigs pa yin gyi /
translated: It is logical that some moments of the continuum are directly capable of producing the effect and depend on another continuum.

original: rang gi rgyud tsam la ltos pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rang gi rgyud tsam la ltos pa ni ma yin te /
translated: But they do not depend on their own continuum alone,

original: rgyu tha dad pa la 'bras bu tha dad pa med par thal ba'i phyir dang / skad cig tha dad pa tsam yang tha dad par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu tha dad pa la 'bras bu tha dad pa med par thal ba'i phyir dang / skad cig tha dad pa tsam yang tha dad par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it follows that different causes would not have different effects, and because mere difference in moment does not make them different.

original: ha cang thal bar ma gyur cig ces ma mthong ba yang rang gi 'dod pas rgyu nyid du brtag par nus ba ma yin no //
analyzed: ha cang thal bar ma gyur cig ces ma mthong ba yang rang gi 'dod pas rgyu nyid du brtag par nus ba ma yin no //
translated: We cannot imagine that what is not seen is a cause, fearing that it would lead to absurd consequences.

original: des na gang gi tshe dang po tshogs pa'i dus nyid na mig la sogs pa'i nus ba skyed pa de'i tshe ni phan tshun tshogs par byed pa'i rkyen du gyur pa'i rkyen rnams kyis dngos su skyed par nus pa nyid du skyed pa yin la /
analyzed: des na gang gi tshe dang po tshogs pa'i dus nyid na mig la sogs pa'i nus ba skyed pa de'i tshe ni phan tshun tshogs par byed pa'i rkyen du gyur pa'i rkyen rnams kyis dngos su skyed par nus pa nyid du skyed pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, when the eye and so on generate the potential at the time of the assembly, at that time the conditions that are the conditions of mutual assembly directly generate the potential.

original: yang gang gi tshe phan tshun tshogs par gyur kyang nus pa med pa de'i tshe ni phan tshun nus pa bzhag pa'i rim gyis nus par 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: yang gang gi tshe phan tshun tshogs par gyur kyang nus pa med pa de'i tshe ni phan tshun nus pa bzhag pa'i rim gyis nus par 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: When they mutually assemble but are not able to generate, then they become able to generate through the process of mutual establishment of ability.

original: skyes bu snang ba nas mun par zhugs pa bzhin no //üîΩde dag phan tshun phan 'dogs par nus pa yang gnas skabs gang zhig mig gi rnam par shes pa skyed par nus pa'i gnas skabs de nyid yin par brtag par bya ba yin te /
