analyzed: gcig dang du ma'i tha snyad nyams par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the conventions of one and many would be undermined.

original: 'di nyid ston pa ni gcig kyang de yin la du ma yang de yin pas gcig dang du ma'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid ston pa ni gcig kyang de yin la du ma yang de yin pas gcig dang du ma'o //
translated: This is what is being shown: it is one and many, because it is one and it is many.

original: de ltar ma yin pa ni gcig dang du mar mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar ma yin pa ni gcig dang du mar mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: It is not like that, because it is not one and many.

original: 'gro ba gcig dang du ma'i nges pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ni ha cang thal ba'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba gcig dang du ma'i nges pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ni ha cang thal ba'o //
translated: It follows, absurdly, that the world would be devoid of the ascertainment of one and many.

original: thams cad la du ma nyid du thal ba'i phyir gcig pa nyid med pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: thams cad la du ma nyid du thal ba'i phyir gcig pa nyid med pa ma yin nam /
translated: Isn't it the case that there is no oneness because it follows, absurdly, that everything is many?

original: du ma nyid du nges pa med pa ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: du ma nyid du nges pa med pa ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is it ascertained that there is no multiplicity?

original: bshad pa / de la tha dad par ma rtogs pa ste de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bshad pa / de la tha dad par ma rtogs pa ste de'i phyir ro //
translated: NƒÅgƒÅrjuna responds: Because it is not realized as distinct.

original: gang gi phyir tha dad pa nyid du ma rtogs pa de'i phyir tha dad pa nyid kyi tha snyad med pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir tha dad pa nyid du ma rtogs pa de'i phyir tha dad pa nyid kyi tha snyad med pa yin no //
translated: Because it is not realized as distinct, therefore there is no convention of distinctness.

original: tha dad pa nyid du ma rtogs pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: tha dad pa nyid du ma rtogs pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is it not realized as distinct?

original: bshad pa / thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la gcig tu nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bshad pa / thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la gcig tu nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: He says: Because the nature of all is not ascertained as one.

original: gang gi phyir 'ga' zhig tu gcig tu ma nges na de'i phyir du ma nyid du rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'ga' zhig tu gcig tu ma nges na de'i phyir du ma nyid du rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Because it is not ascertained as one in some places, therefore it is not realized as multiple.

original: 'di ltar gang las bzlog na tha dad pa med pa'i tha snyad kyi yul du 'gyur ba de ni tha dad pa'i tha snyad kyi yul yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar gang las bzlog na tha dad pa med pa'i tha snyad kyi yul du 'gyur ba de ni tha dad pa'i tha snyad kyi yul yin no //
translated: In this way, that which is the object of the convention of nondistinctness is the object of the convention of distinctness.

original: ji ltar sna tshogs su snang ba la tha dad pa'i tha snyad yin pa de bzhin du de las bzlog pa sna tshogs ma yin pa la yang yin @81a * //
analyzed: ji ltar sna tshogs su snang ba la tha dad pa'i tha snyad yin pa de bzhin du de las bzlog pa sna tshogs ma yin pa la yang yin @81a * //
translated: Just as the convention of distinctness applies to the appearance of diversity, so too it applies to the opposite of that, nondiversity.

original: te ; de'i phyir 'ga' zhig tu tha dad pa las bzlog pa gnas pa med pa'i phyir tha dad pa nyid gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: te ; de'i phyir 'ga' zhig tu tha dad pa las bzlog pa gnas pa med pa'i phyir tha dad pa nyid gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, since the opposite of difference does not exist anywhere, difference itself does not endure.

original: 'gal ba'i chos 'di ni dngos po nyid kyi yin no //
analyzed: 'gal ba'i chos 'di ni dngos po nyid kyi yin no //
translated: This is the nature of contradictory properties.

original: de'i phyir gcig mi gnas na gnyi ga yang gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir gcig mi gnas na gnyi ga yang gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, if one does not endure, both do not endure.

original: gang gi phyir nges pa'i tha snyad dag la ni yul nges pas khyab pa yin la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir nges pa'i tha snyad dag la ni yul nges pas khyab pa yin la /
translated: Because in the case of determinate conventions, the pervasion is by the determination of the object.

original: nges byed med na yang khyab par byed pa yul nges pa med par 'gyur ba de'i phyir 'gro ba gcig dang du mar mi 'gyur na de ltar yang rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: nges byed med na yang khyab par byed pa yul nges pa med par 'gyur ba de'i phyir 'gro ba gcig dang du mar mi 'gyur na de ltar yang rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: And if there is no determiner, the pervader, the determination of the object would not exist. Therefore, if the world is neither one nor many, that is not reasonable.

original: gang gi phyir sna tshogs pa las sna tshogs pa'i don byed pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba ni gcig la ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir sna tshogs pa las sna tshogs pa'i don byed pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba ni gcig la ma yin no //
translated: Because from a variety, a variety of effects arise, but not from a unity.

original: gang gi don byed pa'i rgyu mtshan can gyi yod pa nyid gang las log pa de ni de'i bdag nyid ma yin la /
analyzed: gang gi don byed pa'i rgyu mtshan can gyi yod pa nyid gang las log pa de ni de'i bdag nyid ma yin la /
translated: That which is the reason for the existence of an effect is not the nature of that effect.

original: dngos po yang yin te des na gzhan du grub bo //
analyzed: dngos po yang yin te des na gzhan du grub bo //
translated: It is also a real entity, and therefore it is established as something other.

original: gcig nyid dam du ma don du gnyer bas kyang yul 'ga' zhig spangs nas 'ga' zhig la 'jug pa yin la /
analyzed: gcig nyid dam du ma don du gnyer bas kyang yul 'ga' zhig spangs nas 'ga' zhig la 'jug pa yin la /
translated: One who seeks either unity or multiplicity must abandon some objects and engage in others.

original: nges par zhugs pa na yang gcig dang du ma'i yul gyi bsgrub par bya ba thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nges par zhugs pa na yang gcig dang du ma'i yul gyi bsgrub par bya ba thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: And when one definitely engages in them, one will attain the object that is either one or many.

original: nges pa dang ldan pa'i 'bras bu thob pa ni nges pa dang ldan pa'i 'jug pa las yin gyi /
analyzed: nges pa dang ldan pa'i 'bras bu thob pa ni nges pa dang ldan pa'i 'jug pa las yin gyi /
translated: The attainment of a definite result is from a definite engagement.

original: tshad ma sngon du 'gro ba'i nges pas bskyed pa'i 'jug pa med par ni ma yin no //
analyzed: tshad ma sngon du 'gro ba'i nges pas bskyed pa'i 'jug pa med par ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not that there is no engagement that is generated by a definite cognition that is preceded by a valid cognition.

original: gcig dang du ma dag gi tshad ma sngon du 'gro ba can gyi nges pa gang yin pa yang da ltar rung ba'i yul la mthong ba'i snang ba tha dad pa dang / tha mi dad pa sngon du 'gro ba can du grub bo //
analyzed: gcig dang du ma dag gi tshad ma sngon du 'gro ba can gyi nges pa gang yin pa yang da ltar rung ba'i yul la mthong ba'i snang ba tha dad pa dang / tha mi dad pa sngon du 'gro ba can du grub bo //
translated: And that definite cognition that is preceded by a valid cognition of one or many is established as preceded by the appearance of a different or nondifferent object.

original: de lta mod kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pas spyi rang bzhin gzhan gyis dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gyur pa ma yin par dogs pa bsu ba'o //
analyzed: de lta mod kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pas spyi rang bzhin gzhan gyis dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gyur pa ma yin par dogs pa bsu ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúEven so‚Äù and so on respond to the qualm that the universal is not a transformation that has the characteristic of being perceived by something different from it.

original: spyi snang du zin kyang ste dbang po'i shes pa la rnam par 'jog kyang tha dad par bye brag tu gsal bar khong du chud par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: spyi snang du zin kyang ste dbang po'i shes pa la rnam par 'jog kyang tha dad par bye brag tu gsal bar khong du chud par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Even if the universal is perceived, that is, even if it is posited in the sense perception, it is not understood as a distinct particular.

original: ma rtogs pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: ma rtogs pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because it is not understood.

original: gsal bar dang spyi dag par rtogs pa'i rgyu yul dang dus tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal bar dang spyi dag par rtogs pa'i rgyu yul dang dus tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The cause of understanding the particular and the universal is not the absence of difference in terms of place and time.

original: ma rtogs pa ni rang bzhin nges par ma zin pa ste /
analyzed: ma rtogs pa ni rang bzhin nges par ma zin pa ste /
translated: Not understanding is not ascertaining the nature.

original: nges par ma zin pa de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nges par ma zin pa de'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of not ascertaining it.

original: 'di skad brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa yin no //
translated: This is what is being said.

original: rang bzhin rtogs pas rgyu yod na ni rtogs shing nges par zin pa na tha dad par nges par 'gyur ba yin na de ltar yang ma yin te /
analyzed: rang bzhin rtogs pas rgyu yod na ni rtogs shing nges par zin pa na tha dad par nges par 'gyur ba yin na de ltar yang ma yin te /
translated: If the cause of understanding the nature were understanding and ascertaining, then there would be ascertainment of difference, but that is not the case.

original: de'i phyir ma nges pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir ma nges pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not ascertained.

original: de ni mi rigs te zhes @81b bya ba ni de zlog par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de ni mi rigs te zhes @81b bya ba ni de zlog par byed pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat is not reasonable‚Äù is the refutation of that.

original: bsam pa ni spyi de ci 'dra bar khas len pa de ni mi rtogs par mi rigs so zhes bya ba 'di yin no //
analyzed: bsam pa ni spyi de ci 'dra bar khas len pa de ni mi rtogs par mi rigs so zhes bya ba 'di yin no //
translated: The thought is that it is not reasonable not to understand that generality just as it is accepted.

original: gtan tshigs ston pa ni spyi de la yul gzhan la blo dang de ni sgra de dag 'jug pa de'i phyir te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs ston pa ni spyi de la yul gzhan la blo dang de ni sgra de dag 'jug pa de'i phyir te /
translated: The presentation of the reason is that generality is the engagement of cognition and terms in other objects, because of that.

original: gtan tshigs de'i phyir na de mi rtogs shing nges par mi zin pa mi rigs so //
analyzed: gtan tshigs de'i phyir na de mi rtogs shing nges par mi zin pa mi rigs so //
translated: Due to that reason, it is not reasonable not to understand and ascertain that.

original: 'di nyid 'brel pa bshad pa ni blo dang sgra de dag rjes su 'gro ba de la brten pa gang yin pa de dag ni de la brten pa ste tha dad pa'i khyad par de ni de lta ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di nyid 'brel pa bshad pa ni blo dang sgra de dag rjes su 'gro ba de la brten pa gang yin pa de dag ni de la brten pa ste tha dad pa'i khyad par de ni de lta ma yin no //
translated: This itself is the explanation of the connection: that which is based on the subsequent cognition and terms is based on that, but the different particulars are not like that.

original: rjes su 'gro ba na de rnam pa gcig tu rtogs pas par bya ba na ji ltar spyi mi rtogs zhes bya /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba na de rnam pa gcig tu rtogs pas par bya ba na ji ltar spyi mi rtogs zhes bya /
translated: When there is subsequent understanding, if it is to be understood in one aspect, how can the generality not be understood?

original: rnam par ma phyed ces bya /
analyzed: rnam par ma phyed ces bya /
translated: It is said ‚Äúnot distinguished.‚Äù

original: rtogs pa nyid du rigs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rtogs pa nyid du rigs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is reasonable to understand.

original: spyi mthong ba ni rnam par 'dzin pa ste /
analyzed: spyi mthong ba ni rnam par 'dzin pa ste /
translated: The universal is seen by the apprehension of the particulars.

original: de'i mthus so //
analyzed: de'i mthus so //
translated: It is due to the power of that.

original: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being said:

original: phan tshun tha dad pa'i khyad par rnams ni rjes su 'gro ba gcig po gang yin pa'i rnam pa 'dzin pa'i shes pa tha dad pa med par gzung ba yin na /
analyzed: phan tshun tha dad pa'i khyad par rnams ni rjes su 'gro ba gcig po gang yin pa'i rnam pa 'dzin pa'i shes pa tha dad pa med par gzung ba yin na /
translated: If the particulars that are different from each other are apprehended without a difference in the cognition that apprehends the aspect that is the single universal,üîΩthen the single universal is not realized as a thing that is different from those particulars.

original: spyi gcig po de yang khyad par de dag las tha dad pa'i dngos por ma rtogs so zhe na ni de'i phyir khyad par rnams kyi rang bzhin ltar de yang tha dad pa nyid du rtogs par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: spyi gcig po de yang khyad par de dag las tha dad pa'i dngos por ma rtogs so zhe na ni de'i phyir khyad par rnams kyi rang bzhin ltar de yang tha dad pa nyid du rtogs par 'gyur zhing /
translated: Therefore, like the nature of the particulars, it would be realized as different.

original: de las kyang rang nyid gcig nyid du khyad par rnams las tha dad par ma nges pa na ji ltar khyad par de dag la rang gi rnam pa can dang bsres nas rang bzhin gcig tu ston par byed /
analyzed: de las kyang rang nyid gcig nyid du khyad par rnams las tha dad par ma nges pa na ji ltar khyad par de dag la rang gi rnam pa can dang bsres nas rang bzhin gcig tu ston par byed /
translated: And if it is not ascertained as a single thing that is different from the particulars, how could it be shown to be the same nature as the particulars by mixing it with its own aspect?

original: de gcig tu nges na ni de dang bsres nas rang bzhin gcig tu nges par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de gcig tu nges na ni de dang bsres nas rang bzhin gcig tu nges par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is ascertained as a single thing, then it would be ascertained as the same nature as the particulars by mixing with them.

original: gang las shes par bya ba ni 'di nyid ston pa'o //üîΩkhyad par gyi don gang las /
analyzed: gang las shes par bya ba ni 'di nyid ston pa'o // khyad par gyi don gang las /
translated: The meaning of the distinction is that from which the distinction is known.

original: khyad par can gang la sgra dang blo dag 'jug pa ste ;
analyzed: khyad par can gang la sgra dang blo dag 'jug pa ste ;
translated: The meaning of the distinguished is that which is the basis of the word and the basis of the distinction.

original: sgra dang shes pa dag de'i rnam pa dang ldan pa nyid kyis de'i rjes su 'gro ba ni 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: sgra dang shes pa dag de'i rnam pa dang ldan pa nyid kyis de'i rjes su 'gro ba ni 'jug pa yin no //
translated: The word and the cognition are said to be engaged in it because they are endowed with its aspect.

original: khyad par de ma rtogs par ni khyad par can gyi don te /
analyzed: khyad par de ma rtogs par ni khyad par can gyi don te /
translated: The meaning of the distinguished is not known without the distinction.

original: de ltar rtogs par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar rtogs par mi 'gyur te /
translated: It is not known in that way.

original: dbyig pa can bzhin no //
analyzed: dbyig pa can bzhin no //
translated: Like the man with the stick.

original: gang gi phyir rgyu mtshan dbyig pa'i khyad par gyi rnam pa ma rtogs par ni lha sbyin dbyig pa'i rnam pa'i khyad par can du 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rgyu mtshan dbyig pa'i khyad par gyi rnam pa ma rtogs par ni lha sbyin dbyig pa'i rnam pa'i khyad par can du 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because without knowing the distinction of the stick as the reason, the man with the stick is not apprehended as distinguished by the aspect of the stick.

original: 'dis ni khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa'i dngos po bstan to //
analyzed: 'dis ni khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa'i dngos po bstan to //
translated: This shows the relation of the pervaded and the pervader.

original: don gzhan dang 'brel par 'dzin pa la ni don gzhan rtogs pas khyab pa yin te /
analyzed: don gzhan dang 'brel par 'dzin pa la ni don gzhan rtogs pas khyab pa yin te /
translated: In the apprehension of connection with another meaning, there is pervasion by the knowledge of another meaning.

original: don gzhan ma rtogs na ni de dang lhan @82a * //
analyzed: don gzhan ma rtogs na ni de dang lhan @82a * //
translated: Without knowing another meaning, there is no connection with it.

original: cig gzung bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: cig gzung bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not apprehended as singular.

original: rnam par phye nas gzung ba yang med de /
analyzed: rnam par phye nas gzung ba yang med de /
translated: Nor is there apprehension of it as differentiated,

original: de'i phyir khyab par byad pa med pas khyab par bya ba yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir khyab par byad pa med pas khyab par bya ba yod pa ma yin no //
translated: because there is no pervasion.

original: gang gi phyir spyi mi rtogs pa mi rigs pa de'i phyir de tha dad par snang bar khas blang bar bya ba yin na snang ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir spyi mi rtogs pa mi rigs pa de'i phyir de tha dad par snang bar khas blang bar bya ba yin na snang ba yang ma yin te /
translated: Since it is not tenable that a universal is not apprehended, therefore it must be accepted that it appears as differentiated, but it does not appear.

original: de'i phyir dbang po las skyes blo //
analyzed: de'i phyir dbang po las skyes blo //
translated: Therefore, the cognition arising from the sense faculties

original: thams cad khyad par yul can nyid //
analyzed: thams cad khyad par yul can nyid //
translated: is all about a specific object.

original: tshig le'ur byas pa'i don bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir gtan tshigs bshad pa /
analyzed: tshig le'ur byas pa'i don bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir gtan tshigs bshad pa /
translated: In order to establish the meaning of the verses, he explains the reason:

original: dbang po shes pa la rang gi mtshan nyid las tha dad par nges pa'i rang bzhin gyi spyi mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbang po shes pa la rang gi mtshan nyid las tha dad par nges pa'i rang bzhin gyi spyi mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because a universal that is a nature ascertained as different from the cognition of the sense faculty does not appear.

original: 'di snyam du rjes su 'gro ba'i rang gi mtshan nyid kho na sgra'i brjod byar 'gyur ro snyam na /
analyzed: 'di snyam du rjes su 'gro ba'i rang gi mtshan nyid kho na sgra'i brjod byar 'gyur ro snyam na /
translated: If you think that only the specific nature of the universal would be the object of the word,

original: snang ba rnams kyang zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: snang ba rnams kyang zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: he says, ‚ÄúEven the appearances . . .‚Äù

original: rang gi mtshan nyid nges par snang ba rnams ni yul la sogs pa tha dad pas rjes su mi 'gro ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid nges par snang ba rnams ni yul la sogs pa tha dad pas rjes su mi 'gro ba'i phyir te /
translated: Those that appear as ascertained by intrinsic identity do not follow from the difference of object, etc.

original: rgyu de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu de'i phyir ro //
translated: For that reason.

original: khyad par can zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs kyi tshig ste /
analyzed: khyad par can zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs kyi tshig ste /
translated: ‚Äú Distinctive‚Äù is a term for a reason.

original: gang gi phyir khyad par can yin pa'i phyir dbang po'i blo ni brjod du med pa bsnyad par mi nus pa'i don mngon du byed pa yin no zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir khyad par can yin pa'i phyir dbang po'i blo ni brjod du med pa bsnyad par mi nus pa'i don mngon du byed pa yin no zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: Because it is distinctive, the sense consciousnesses manifest objects that are inexpressible, that cannot be described.

original: de'i phyir 'di thams cad kyi don bsdus pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di thams cad kyi don bsdus pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: Therefore, the meaning of all of this is summarized in the following:

original: don gang zhig brda'i dus su sgra gang dang 'brel par mthong ba ma yin pa de ni des khyad par can du gzung ba ma yin te /
analyzed: don gang zhig brda'i dus su sgra gang dang 'brel par mthong ba ma yin pa de ni des khyad par can du gzung ba ma yin te /
translated: Any object that is not seen to be related to a word at the time of the creation of the convention is not apprehended as distinctive by that word.

original: dper na ba lang gi sgras rta bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na ba lang gi sgras rta bzhin no //
translated: For example, like a horse by the word ‚Äúcow.‚Äù

original: dbang po'i don thams cad kyang sgra thams cad dang 'brel pa mthong ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: dbang po'i don thams cad kyang sgra thams cad dang 'brel pa mthong ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: And all sense objects are not seen to be related to all words. This is a nonobservation of a pervasion.

original: sgras khyad par can du gzung ba'i don ni rang gi ngo bo med pas khyab pa yin la brda ma byas pa'i sgras don khyad par can du bzung na ni /
analyzed: sgras khyad par can du gzung ba'i don ni rang gi ngo bo med pas khyab pa yin la brda ma byas pa'i sgras don khyad par can du bzung na ni /
translated: The meaning of a qualified word is necessarily devoid of its own entity.üîΩIf one grasps the meaning of a qualified word without having made a conventional symbol, then it follows that the entity of the relationship between the word and its meaning would not exist.

original: sgra don gyi 'brel pa'i ngo bo can du thal ba de'i phyir chos gzhan la khyab par byed pa med pa'i phyir bcos bu des khyad par can du 'dzin pa la ni 'brel pa la mthong ba nyid kyis khyab pa'i phyir 'brel pa grub bo //
analyzed: sgra don gyi 'brel pa'i ngo bo can du thal ba de'i phyir chos gzhan la khyab par byed pa med pa'i phyir bcos bu des khyad par can du 'dzin pa la ni 'brel pa la mthong ba nyid kyis khyab pa'i phyir 'brel pa grub bo //
translated: Therefore, since the relationship does not pervade other phenomena, the grasping of a qualified word by a conventional symbol is pervaded by the seeing of the relationship. Thus the relationship is established.

original: gtan tshigs ma grub pa yang ma yin te /üîΩgang gi phyir skad cig ma nyid kyis brda gzo ba na don 'gags pa'i phyir dbang pos rtogs par bya ba'i don la brda bya bar mi nus pa yin la nus pa nyid yin yang rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir rtogs pa dang ldan pa dgos pa
analyzed: gtan tshigs ma grub pa yang ma yin te / gang gi phyir skad cig ma nyid kyis brda gzo ba na don 'gags pa'i phyir dbang pos rtogs par bya ba'i don la brda bya bar mi nus pa yin la nus pa nyid yin yang rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir rtogs pa dang ldan pa dgos pa
translated: The reason is not unestablished.üîΩBecause when one makes a conventional symbol with an instant, the meaning is destroyed, one cannot make a conventional symbol for the meaning that is to be understood by the sense faculty.

original: med pa'i brda byed pa la mi @82b 'jug go //
analyzed: med pa'i brda byed pa la mi @82b 'jug go //
translated: Even if one could, one would not engage in making a conventional symbol that lacks concomitance because it would be pointless.

original: 'jug na yang gang la brda byas pa de ni 'das pa yin la /
analyzed: 'jug na yang gang la brda byas pa de ni 'das pa yin la /
translated: If it does engage, then what is signified is past.

original: gang yang tha snyad kyi dus na rtogs pa de thams cad sngon ma mthong ba yin pa'i phyir de la brda med pa yin no //
analyzed: gang yang tha snyad kyi dus na rtogs pa de thams cad sngon ma mthong ba yin pa'i phyir de la brda med pa yin no //
translated: And since all that is understood at the time of convention is not previously seen, there is no signification of it.

original: 'dir ni bstan bcos mdzad pas sgra sbyor ba yang zhes bya ba la sogs pas dgos pa med pa brda mi byed pa'i rgyur brjod pa yin gyi mi nus pa nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir ni bstan bcos mdzad pas sgra sbyor ba yang zhes bya ba la sogs pas dgos pa med pa brda mi byed pa'i rgyur brjod pa yin gyi mi nus pa nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: Here, the author of the treatise states that the reason for not signifying what is not necessary is because it is not signified, as in the statement ‚Äúeven if it is connected to a word,‚Äù but it is not because it is not possible.

original: rnam 'grel du ni mi nus pa yang brjod do //
analyzed: rnam 'grel du ni mi nus pa yang brjod do //
translated: In the PramaÃÑnÔ¨Å avaÃÑrtika, it is also said that it is not possible.

original: mngon sum rnam par rtog pa med pa dang brjod du med pa'i yul can du rnam par gnas pa la gzhan gyis smras pa /
analyzed: mngon sum rnam par rtog pa med pa dang brjod du med pa'i yul can du rnam par gnas pa la gzhan gyis smras pa /
translated: With regard to perception, which is non-conceptual and has inexpressible objects, someone else says:

original: mngon sum las ji ltar tha snyad du 'gyur zhes 'brel to//
analyzed: mngon sum las ji ltar tha snyad du 'gyur zhes 'brel to//
translated: How can there be a convention from perception?

original: rnam pa can gang gis te ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rnam pa can gang gis te ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: By what form? It is not. This is the meaning.

original: 'o na zhes bya ba ni ma bzod pa ste /
analyzed: 'o na zhes bya ba ni ma bzod pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúWell‚Äù means ‚ÄúI cannot bear this.‚Äù

original: gang gi phyir 'jug pa'i yan lag ni tshad mar brjod pa yin na 'jug pa'i yan lag ma yin pa'i phyir mngon sum yang tshad mar gyur pa ni mi bzod do snyam du bsams pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'jug pa'i yan lag ni tshad mar brjod pa yin na 'jug pa'i yan lag ma yin pa'i phyir mngon sum yang tshad mar gyur pa ni mi bzod do snyam du bsams pa'o //
translated: Because the factor of engagement is said to be valid cognition, and because direct perception is not a factor of engagement, it is not tenable that direct perception is a valid cognition.

original: da ni zhes bya ba ni mngon sum rtog pa med par khas len pa'i dus na'o //
analyzed: da ni zhes bya ba ni mngon sum rtog pa med par khas len pa'i dus na'o //
translated: Now, at the time of accepting direct perception as non-conceptual,

original: nges pa ni gtan la phebs pa ste /
analyzed: nges pa ni gtan la phebs pa ste /
translated: certainty is ascertainment.

original: de gang la med pa de lta bu'i bdag nyid gang yin pa'i mngon sum de las tha snyad de /
analyzed: de gang la med pa de lta bu'i bdag nyid gang yin pa'i mngon sum de las tha snyad de /
translated: That which lacks that is the nature of direct perception.

original: bde ba bsgrub pa'i dngos po'i yul la 'jug pa dang / sdug bsngal sgrub pa'i yul la ldog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bde ba bsgrub pa'i dngos po'i yul la 'jug pa dang / sdug bsngal sgrub pa'i yul la ldog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: From that direct perception, one would not engage in the object that is the basis for achieving happiness, nor would one turn away from the object that is the basis for achieving suffering.

original: bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The idea is this:

original: gang gi phyir mngon sum ni ma nges pa'i bdag nyid don nye bar snang ba 'ga' zhig tu zad la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir mngon sum ni ma nges pa'i bdag nyid don nye bar snang ba 'ga' zhig tu zad la /
translated: Because direct perception is merely the appearance of some object that is uncertain,

original: nges pa ma yin na yang skad cig ma nyid bzhin du 'di 'jug pa'i yul ma yin no //
analyzed: nges pa ma yin na yang skad cig ma nyid bzhin du 'di 'jug pa'i yul ma yin no //
translated: and because it is not certain, it is not the object of engagement, like momentariness.

original: gzhan yang sgrub par byed pa'i dngos po snang ba tsam 'dzin pa'i mngon sum gyis 'bras bu nye ba ma yin pa la /
analyzed: gzhan yang sgrub par byed pa'i dngos po snang ba tsam 'dzin pa'i mngon sum gyis 'bras bu nye ba ma yin pa la /
translated: Moreover, the mere appearance of the thing that is the means of accomplishing the object is apprehended by direct perception.

original: mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu bsgrub pas de dang 'brel pa nyid du 'dzin par nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu bsgrub pas de dang 'brel pa nyid du 'dzin par nus pa ma yin te /
translated: But it is not possible to apprehend the connection with the object that is desired, because the result is not present.

original: rnam par rtog pa med pa'i mngon sum dngos po nye bar 'gyur ba dag gi 'brel pa yang 'dzin par mi nus pa gang yin pa des dngos po nye ba ma yin pa byed pa nyid ji ltar 'dzin par 'gyur /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa med pa'i mngon sum dngos po nye bar 'gyur ba dag gi 'brel pa yang 'dzin par mi nus pa gang yin pa des dngos po nye ba ma yin pa byed pa nyid ji ltar 'dzin par 'gyur /
translated: If the nonconceptual direct perception is not able to apprehend the connection with the things that are present, how could it apprehend the thing that is not present?

original: bde ba sgrub par byed par dngos po ma nges na yang /
analyzed: bde ba sgrub par byed par dngos po ma nges na yang /
translated: Even if the thing that is the means of accomplishing pleasure is not ascertained,

original: rtog pa dang ldan pa 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtog pa dang ldan pa 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the one who has conception will not engage in it.

original: de'i phyir 'jug pa'i yul du byed pa ni bde ba sgrub par byed pa'i dngos po la de'i rang bzhin du gtan la phebs pa dang @83a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'jug pa'i yul du byed pa ni bde ba sgrub par byed pa'i dngos po la de'i rang bzhin du gtan la phebs pa dang @83a * //
translated: Therefore, the object of engagement is the ascertainment of the nature of the thing that is the means of accomplishing pleasure.

original: ldan pa nges pa'i shes pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ldan pa nges pa'i shes pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: It is the definitive cognition, not anything else.

original: yang ci'i phyir nges pa'i bdag nyid kyi mngon sum nyid las tha snyad du 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir nges pa'i bdag nyid kyi mngon sum nyid las tha snyad du 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Moreover, why would a conventional be due to a perception that has a determinate nature?

original: smras pa / 'di ni bde ba sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: smras pa / 'di ni bde ba sgrub pa'o //
translated: He says: This is the means of attaining pleasure,üîΩthis is the means of attaining pain.

original: 'di ni sdug bsngal sgrub pa'o zhes 'di'o zhes mngon sum nyid du nges te /
analyzed: 'di ni sdug bsngal sgrub pa'o zhes 'di'o zhes mngon sum nyid du nges te /
translated: One ascertains this as perception.

original: yongs su bcad na ni tha snyad du byed pa'i skyes bu bde ba sgrub par byed pa nyid du nye ba'i don yongs su gcod pa yin no //
analyzed: yongs su bcad na ni tha snyad du byed pa'i skyes bu bde ba sgrub par byed pa nyid du nye ba'i don yongs su gcod pa yin no //
translated: When one has ascertained it, then the person who is engaged in making a conventional ascertains the object that is near as the means of attaining pleasure.

original: bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi sgrub par byed pa dag ces bya ba ni 'jug pa'i yul ston pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi sgrub par byed pa dag ces bya ba ni 'jug pa'i yul ston pa'o //
translated: The means of attaining pleasure and pain are the objects of engagement.

original: bde ba sgrub pa dang sdug bsngal sgrub pa la ji ltar rigs par thob pa dang spang ba'i don du 'jug par byed do //
analyzed: bde ba sgrub pa dang sdug bsngal sgrub pa la ji ltar rigs par thob pa dang spang ba'i don du 'jug par byed do //
translated: One engages in the means of attaining pleasure and the means of attaining pain in order to obtain and abandon pleasure and pain, respectively.

original: phyir zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs kyi don te /
analyzed: phyir zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs kyi don te /
translated: The word ‚Äúbecause‚Äù indicates the reason.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar nges pas 'jug pa yin pa de'i phyir nges pa ma yin pa'i shes pa ni tha snyad kyi yan lag ma yin la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar nges pas 'jug pa yin pa de'i phyir nges pa ma yin pa'i shes pa ni tha snyad kyi yan lag ma yin la /
translated: Since one engages in this way because of ascertainment, a nonascertaining consciousness is not a factor of convention.

original: gang gi phyir nges pa 'jug pa'i yul yin pa de'i phyir nges pa med pa'i bdag nyid kyi dngos po ni 'jug pa'i yul du bya ba ma yin zhing de las kyang 'jug pa'i yan lag ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: gang gi phyir nges pa 'jug pa'i yul yin pa de'i phyir nges pa med pa'i bdag nyid kyi dngos po ni 'jug pa'i yul du bya ba ma yin zhing de las kyang 'jug pa'i yan lag ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: Because it is the object of ascertainment, therefore a thing that has an uncertain nature is not to be taken as the object of engagement, and it is not a limb of engagement.

original: gang gi phyir lag nas bzung ba la sogs pa byas pas ni 'jug par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir shes pa'i 'jug par byed pa ni 'jug pa'i yul du byed pa las gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir lag nas bzung ba la sogs pa byas pas ni 'jug par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir shes pa'i 'jug par byed pa ni 'jug pa'i yul du byed pa las gzhan ma yin no //
translated: Because it is not the case that the act of grasping the hand, etc. is the cause of engagement, the cause of the engagement of consciousness is not different from the object of engagement.

original: 'jug par byed pa 'di la yang nges par byed pa nyid kyis khyab pa yin no //
analyzed: 'jug par byed pa 'di la yang nges par byed pa nyid kyis khyab pa yin no //
translated: And in this cause of engagement, there is the pervasion of the act of ascertainment.

original: mngon sum la ni de yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir 'jug par byed pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba ni pha rol po'i bsam pa'o //
analyzed: mngon sum la ni de yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir 'jug par byed pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba ni pha rol po'i bsam pa'o //
translated: The opponent thinks that since that does not exist in perception, it is not the cause of engagement.

original: slob dpon gyis kyang khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa'i dngos po de bden na yang /
analyzed: slob dpon gyis kyang khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa'i dngos po de bden na yang /
translated: Even though the master accepts the relation of the pervader and the pervaded,

original: rtog pa med pa dang rtog pa dang bcas pa'i mngon sum dag 'jug pa'i yan lag nyid du khyad par med par bstan pa'i phyir skyon 'di med de zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: rtog pa med pa dang rtog pa dang bcas pa'i mngon sum dag 'jug pa'i yan lag nyid du khyad par med par bstan pa'i phyir skyon 'di med de zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: In order to demonstrate that there is no difference between non-conceptual and conceptual direct perception in terms of their being a limb of engagement, he says, ‚Äúthere is no fault.‚Äù

original: 'di la 'jug pa'i yul mig nas pa ni rnam par gnyis te /
analyzed: 'di la 'jug pa'i yul mig nas pa ni rnam par gnyis te /
translated: The object of engagement in this regard is twofold:üîΩthe object of engagement of direct perception and the object of engagement of inference.

original: de'i dus na nye ba'i rang bzhin ma nges pa'i phyir mngon sum gyis 'jug pa'i yul du byed par mi nus pa'am /
analyzed: de'i dus na nye ba'i rang bzhin ma nges pa'i phyir mngon sum gyis 'jug pa'i yul du byed par mi nus pa'am /
translated: The object of engagement of direct perception is not able to be made into an object of engagement by direct perception, because its nature is not ascertained at that time.

original: gal te yang bya ba byed pa nyid sngar mthong ba nye ba ma yin pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa med pa'i mngon sum gyis ma nges pas 'jug pa'i yul du mi byed /
analyzed: gal te yang bya ba byed pa nyid sngar mthong ba nye ba ma yin pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa med pa'i mngon sum gyis ma nges pas 'jug pa'i yul du mi byed /
translated: Moreover, if the activity of the object of engagement of direct perception is not ascertained by non-conceptual direct perception because it is not seen previously, then it is not made into an object of engagement.

original: de la rnam par rtog pa snga ma ni rgol ba gnyi ga la yang khyad par yod pa ma yin te 'di ltar rnam par @83b rtog pa dang bcas pa'i mngon sum gyis yul dang dus dang rnam pa so sor nges pa gtan la phebs pa yin la
analyzed: de la rnam par rtog pa snga ma ni rgol ba gnyi ga la yang khyad par yod pa ma yin te 'di ltar rnam par @83b rtog pa dang bcas pa'i mngon sum gyis yul dang dus dang rnam pa so sor nges pa gtan la phebs pa yin la
translated: In this regard, the former objection does not make a difference for both parties, because in this way, the object, time, and aspect are ascertained individually by conceptual direct perception.

original: / rnam par rtog pa med pa yang de'i rjes su byed pa de'i stobs kyis skyes pa'i gtan la phebs pa'i shes pas mngon sum gyis gzung ba nges par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: / rnam par rtog pa med pa yang de'i rjes su byed pa de'i stobs kyis skyes pa'i gtan la phebs pa'i shes pas mngon sum gyis gzung ba nges par byed pa yin no //
translated: And the non-conceptual cognition that follows it, by the power of that, ascertains the object that is directly perceived by the cognition that is the result of that.

original: gang yang mthong ba'i rnam shes kyi gzung ba'i rang bzhin de dang de las log pa de nyid de'i stobs kyis skyes pa'i rnam par rtog pas sgra dang bsres nas de kho na ltar zhen par byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gang yang mthong ba'i rnam shes kyi gzung ba'i rang bzhin de dang de las log pa de nyid de'i stobs kyis skyes pa'i rnam par rtog pas sgra dang bsres nas de kho na ltar zhen par byed pa yin gyi /
translated: And that which is the nature of the object grasped by the seeing consciousness, that which is the opposite of that, by the power of that, the conceptual cognition mixes it with sound and causes the ascertainment of that very thing.

original: rnam par rtog pas de la phyi nas don byed par bzod pa'i rang bzhin lhag par bzung ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pas de la phyi nas don byed par bzod pa'i rang bzhin lhag par bzung ba ni ma yin no //
translated: But the conceptual cognition does not grasp as a separate entity the nature of the object's capacity for action.

original: de la de nyid kyis des sam de'i stobs kyis bskyed pas kyang rung ste /
analyzed: de la de nyid kyis des sam de'i stobs kyis bskyed pas kyang rung ste /
translated: In that case, whether it is by that very thing or by the power of that,

original: rnam par rtog pas dngos po 'jug pa'i yul du byas pa la ni khyad par ci yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pas dngos po 'jug pa'i yul du byas pa la ni khyad par ci yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: there is no difference at all in the conceptual cognition taking the entity as its object.

original: ci ste yang rnam par rtog pa med pa la ni ma yin /
analyzed: ci ste yang rnam par rtog pa med pa la ni ma yin /
translated: But if it is not in the non-conceptual cognition,

original: rnam par rtog pas bar du chod pas 'jug pa'i yan lag yin no zhes bya bar 'dod na /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pas bar du chod pas 'jug pa'i yan lag yin no zhes bya bar 'dod na /
translated: If you maintain that it is a condition for the arising of the memory because it is interrupted by conceptualization,

original: rnam par rtog pas bar du chod pas zhes brjod pa 'di ni shin tu chung ste rgol ba gnyi ga'i ltar na yang shes pa'i rgyun chen pos bar du chod pas khyad par med pa nyid du de ma thag nyid du ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pas bar du chod pas zhes brjod pa 'di ni shin tu chung ste rgol ba gnyi ga'i ltar na yang shes pa'i rgyun chen pos bar du chod pas khyad par med pa nyid du de ma thag nyid du ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: then this is a very weak argument, for in the case of both parties in the debate, there is no difference in that the memory is interrupted by a great many other mental states.

original: ci ste phyogs gnyis pa ltar na de lta na yang nye ba'i dngos po de la sngon mthong ba'i bde ba sgrub par byed pa nyid dran par bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: ci ste phyogs gnyis pa ltar na de lta na yang nye ba'i dngos po de la sngon mthong ba'i bde ba sgrub par byed pa nyid dran par bya ba yin gyi /
translated: But if you maintain the second position, then in that case, the memory of the previously seen object that is to be remembered is the cause of the pleasure of recollection.

original: mngon sum du bya ba ni ma yin la /
analyzed: mngon sum du bya ba ni ma yin la /
translated: But it is not the cause of the direct perception of the object.

original: dran pa la ni'o skol gnyi ga yang khyad par yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dran pa la ni'o skol gnyi ga yang khyad par yod pa ma yin no //
translated: And in the case of memory, we both agree that there is no difference.

original: de'i phyir mngon sum gyi nye ba'i dngos po 'jug pa'i yul du byed pa'i bya ba la ni gnyi ga yang mtshungs pa yin la dran pa'i bya ba lhag pas bar du chod par yang mtshungs pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir mngon sum gyi nye ba'i dngos po 'jug pa'i yul du byed pa'i bya ba la ni gnyi ga yang mtshungs pa yin la dran pa'i bya ba lhag pas bar du chod par yang mtshungs pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, in terms of the activity that engages the object that is the proximate entity, both are the same, and in terms of the activity of memory, they are the same in that they are obstructed.

original: de'i phyir nye ba'i dngos po 'jug pa'i yul nyid du byed pa'i phyir mngon sum rnam pa gnyi ga yang 'jug pa'i yan lag yin la shes pa gzhan gyis bar du chod pa'i 'jug pa yang de las skye bas na brgyud pas rgyu yin par yang khyad parüîΩyod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir nye ba'i dngos po 'jug pa'i yul nyid du byed pa'i phyir mngon sum rnam pa gnyi ga yang 'jug pa'i yan lag yin la shes pa gzhan gyis bar du chod pa'i 'jug pa yang de las skye bas na brgyud pas rgyu yin par yang khyad par yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, because it is the activity that engages the object that is the proximate entity, direct perception is a limb of engagement in both aspects. Because the engagement that is obstructed by another consciousness arises from that, it is also not different in being a cause that is indirect.

original: yang ji ltar na mngon sum gnyi ga yang bde ba'i sgrub par byed pa nyid du nges pa dran pa nyid kyis bya ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: yang ji ltar na mngon sum gnyi ga yang bde ba'i sgrub par byed pa nyid du nges pa dran pa nyid kyis bya ba yin zhe na /
translated: Moreover, how is it that both aspects of direct perception are ascertained to be the proof of pleasure by memory?

original: rim pa bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: rim pa bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: In order to demonstrate the sequence, it is said:

original: gang la sngon zhugs pa'i nye ba mngon sum gyi yul du gyur pa de @84a * //
analyzed: gang la sngon zhugs pa'i nye ba mngon sum gyi yul du gyur pa de @84a * //
translated: That which was previously engaged as the object of direct perception

original: mthong ste yod pa na /
analyzed: mthong ste yod pa na /
translated: is seen when it exists.

original: nyid ces bya ba'i tshig ni rgyu dang 'bras bu nges par ston pa'o //
analyzed: nyid ces bya ba'i tshig ni rgyu dang 'bras bu nges par ston pa'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúitself‚Äù indicates the cause and result are ascertained.

original: mthong ba'i dgos pa gang yin pa de mthong ba nyid na mthong ba'i 'bras bu de rnams la dran par byed pa'i dran pa gang yin pa de las so //üîΩji ltar gyur pa zhig las she na //
analyzed: mthong ba'i dgos pa gang yin pa de mthong ba nyid na mthong ba'i 'bras bu de rnams la dran par byed pa'i dran pa gang yin pa de las so // ji ltar gyur pa zhig las she na //
translated: The purpose of seeing is that when one sees, one recollects those results of seeing.

original: ji ltar gyur pa zhig las she na /
analyzed: ji ltar gyur pa zhig las she na /
translated: From what kind of state?

original: myong ba'i zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: myong ba'i zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: From the state of experience.üîΩThe cause of a special result, such as a tree that has previously been planted, is experienced.

original: sngon zhugs pa'i shing la sogs pa 'bras bu khyad par can gyi rgyu yin par myong ba gang yin pa dang / gang yang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po gtan la phabs pa'i 'og rol du 'jug pa'i dus su 'jug pa gnyi ga yang mtshungs par gzung ba yin te /
analyzed: sngon zhugs pa'i shing la sogs pa 'bras bu khyad par can gyi rgyu yin par myong ba gang yin pa dang / gang yang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po gtan la phabs pa'i 'og rol du 'jug pa'i dus su 'jug pa gnyi ga yang mtshungs par gzung ba yin te /
translated: And, after the state of the relation between cause and result has been ascertained, the state of engagement is engaged in. Both are equally apprehended.

original: gcig ni dran pa'i 'du byed skyed par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: gcig ni dran pa'i 'du byed skyed par byed pa yin la /
translated: One generates the formative force of recollection.

original: phyi mas ni sad par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyi mas ni sad par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The latter causes awakening.

original: dran pa'i 'du byed 'jog pa dang // sad par bya ba la de'i mthu yod pa de las byung ba'i ngang tshul gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: dran pa'i 'du byed 'jog pa dang // sad par bya ba la de'i mthu yod pa de las byung ba'i ngang tshul gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the nature of the memory that has the power to place the mind on the object and to arouse it.

original: dran pa de las mngon par 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: dran pa de las mngon par 'dod pa ste /
translated: From that memory, there is the desire to engage.

original: mngon par 'dod pa yang 'jug pa'i yul can dang ldog pa'i yul can dag khyad par med par gzung ngo //
analyzed: mngon par 'dod pa yang 'jug pa'i yul can dang ldog pa'i yul can dag khyad par med par gzung ngo //
translated: And that desire to engage is apprehended without distinction as to whether the object is one that has been engaged or not.

original: mngon par 'dod pa de'i rgyus kyang 'jug pa dang ldog pa'i mtshan nyid kyi tha snyad du 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: mngon par 'dod pa de'i rgyus kyang 'jug pa dang ldog pa'i mtshan nyid kyi tha snyad du 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: And from the cause of that desire to engage, there is the conventional expression that has the character of engagement and withdrawal.

original: mngon sum nyid las dngos su tha snyad du 'gyur pa ma yin pa'i phyir mngon sum rnam pa gnyi ga la yang 'di ni 'jug pa'i rgyu lhag pa yin te /
analyzed: mngon sum nyid las dngos su tha snyad du 'gyur pa ma yin pa'i phyir mngon sum rnam pa gnyi ga la yang 'di ni 'jug pa'i rgyu lhag pa yin te /
translated: But in direct perception, there is no such conventional expression. Therefore, in both cases, direct perception has an additional cause for engagement,

original: bde ba sgrub par byed pa nyid du 'dzin pa'i dran pa 'di bar du zhugs pa yin no zhes dgongs pa yin no //
analyzed: bde ba sgrub par byed pa nyid du 'dzin pa'i dran pa 'di bar du zhugs pa yin no zhes dgongs pa yin no //
translated: and that is the memory that apprehends the attainment of pleasure. This is the intended meaning.

original: 'di nyid rnam par 'brel pa bshad pa ni /
analyzed: 'di nyid rnam par 'brel pa bshad pa ni /
translated: This is also explained in the Sa·πÉyukta:üîΩ‚ÄúWhat is the faculty of memory?

original: mngon sum don te yul la lta ba rnam par 'dzin pa de tsam mam /
analyzed: mngon sum don te yul la lta ba rnam par 'dzin pa de tsam mam /
translated: The object of direct perception is the object, the mere apprehension of the object, the seeing of the object.üîΩ

original: de kho na nyid gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de kho na nyid gang yin pa'o //
translated: The mere perception of the object, the mere seeing of the object, is the reality.

original: tsam smos pa ni nges pa bzlog pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: tsam smos pa ni nges pa bzlog pa'i don du'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúmere‚Äù is for the purpose of excluding determination.

original: mngon sum de lta bur gyur pa yin yang tha snyad du 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum de lta bur gyur pa yin yang tha snyad du 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Even though perception is of that nature, it is still conventional.

original: yang gi sgras ni mngon sum rnam par rtag pa dang bcas pa yin yang tha snyad du 'jug pa'i rim pa ni 'di nyid yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yang gi sgras ni mngon sum rnam par rtag pa dang bcas pa yin yang tha snyad du 'jug pa'i rim pa ni 'di nyid yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù indicates that even though perception is accompanied by conceptualization, the process of engaging in convention is just this.

original: nyams su myong ba zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du snga ma dang phyi mar 'jug pa'i nyams su myong ba gnyis khyad par med par gzung ba yin no //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du snga ma dang phyi mar 'jug pa'i nyams su myong ba gnyis khyad par med par gzung ba yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúExperience‚Äù refers to the nondiscriminated experience of the object that is grasped by the prior and subsequent moments of perception.

original: de'i mthu ni nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'i yul 'dzin pa'i dran pa'i 'du byed 'jog pa dang sad par byed pa dag ste /
analyzed: de'i mthu ni nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'i yul 'dzin pa'i dran pa'i 'du byed 'jog pa dang sad par byed pa dag ste /
translated: The power of that is the establishment and awakening of the formative forces of memory that grasp the object that is experienced.

original: mthu de las 'du byed gzhag pa las brgyud pas dran pa 'byung @84b ba yin no //
analyzed: mthu de las 'du byed gzhag pa las brgyud pas dran pa 'byung @84b ba yin no //
translated: From that power, memory arises through the medium of the establishment of the formative forces.

original: dran pa'i byed pa ston pa ni khyad par can gyi 'bras bu byed pa nyid du myong ba'i don la da ltar mthong ba'i don dang mtshams sbyor ba gcig tu byed pa ste /
analyzed: dran pa'i byed pa ston pa ni khyad par can gyi 'bras bu byed pa nyid du myong ba'i don la da ltar mthong ba'i don dang mtshams sbyor ba gcig tu byed pa ste /
translated: The function of memory is to connect the object of the experience of the special result with the object seen in the present.

original: khyad par can gyi 'bras bu sgrub par mthong ba'i bdag gang yin pa de nyid ni 'di yin no zhes de ltar myong ba gnyis mtshams sbyor bar byed pa'i dran pa mngon sum las skye ba yin la dran pa de nyid kyis kyang khyad par can gyi sgrub
analyzed: khyad par can gyi 'bras bu sgrub par mthong ba'i bdag gang yin pa de nyid ni 'di yin no zhes de ltar myong ba gnyis mtshams sbyor bar byed pa'i dran pa mngon sum las skye ba yin la dran pa de nyid kyis kyang khyad par can gyi sgrub
translated: Memory arises from direct perception, since it connects the two experiences, thinking, ‚ÄúThe one who saw the establishment of the special result is myself.‚ÄùüîΩAlso, that memory connects the object of the establishment of the special result with the object that was previously experienced.

original: par byed pa'i don sngon myong bar gyur pa nyid dngos po de la mtshams sbyor bar byed kyi rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa yin yang 'di'i zhes 'jug pa'i mngon sum las ni sngon myong ba dran pa'i byed pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: par byed pa'i don sngon myong bar gyur pa nyid dngos po de la mtshams sbyor bar byed kyi rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa yin yang 'di'i zhes 'jug pa'i mngon sum las ni sngon myong ba dran pa'i byed pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: However, the function of memory does not exist in the present direct perception that engages the object, thinking, ‚ÄúThis is it,‚Äù even though it is associated with conceptuality.

original: 'on kyang sngar nyams su myong bas bskyed pa'i bag chags sad par byed pa 'ba' zhig tu zad pa la /
analyzed: 'on kyang sngar nyams su myong bas bskyed pa'i bag chags sad par byed pa 'ba' zhig tu zad pa la /
translated: But it is only the latent impressions generated by previous experience that are awakened.

original: de ni rnam par rtog pa med pa la yang khyad par yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni rnam par rtog pa med pa la yang khyad par yod pa ma yin no //
translated: And this is not a special case of non-conceptual cognition.

original: khyad par can byed pa nyid du mtshams sbyor ba'i dran pa de las kyang mngon par 'dod pa skye ba yin no //
analyzed: khyad par can byed pa nyid du mtshams sbyor ba'i dran pa de las kyang mngon par 'dod pa skye ba yin no //
translated: From that memory which connects the object to the act of desiring, the desire arises.

original: 'dod pa'i yul bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa dus snga mar gyur pa'i nye ba mngon sum gyi yul du gyur pa mthong ba nyid na mthong ba'i 'bras bu gang yin pa de rnams la mngon par 'dod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i yul bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa dus snga mar gyur pa'i nye ba mngon sum gyi yul du gyur pa mthong ba nyid na mthong ba'i 'bras bu gang yin pa de rnams la mngon par 'dod pa yin no //
translated: In order to show the object of desire, it is explained: when the object of the past experience becomes the object of direct perception, the desire arises for those things that are the fruit of seeing.

original: tshig le'ur byas par yang 'di mngon par 'dod pa'i yul du bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: tshig le'ur byas par yang 'di mngon par 'dod pa'i yul du bstan pa yin no //
translated: In the verse, it is also shown that this is the object of desire.

original: mngon par 'dod pa'i rgyu ni dran pa yin no //
analyzed: mngon par 'dod pa'i rgyu ni dran pa yin no //
translated: The cause of desire is memory.

original: don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning is as follows:

original: gang don bya ba byed par mthong ba'i don ni dran pa mtshams sbyor ba yin la /
analyzed: gang don bya ba byed par mthong ba'i don ni dran pa mtshams sbyor ba yin la /
translated: The object that is seen to perform a function is the object of memory.

original: mtshams sbyar ma thag pa nyid du don de dag la mngon par 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa 'jug par 'gyur te /
analyzed: mtshams sbyar ma thag pa nyid du don de dag la mngon par 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa 'jug par 'gyur te /
translated: Immediately after the connection, one engages in the desire and non-desire for those objects.

original: mi 'dod pa ni sdug bsngal gyi sgrub par byed pa yongs su dor bar sems pa'o //
analyzed: mi 'dod pa ni sdug bsngal gyi sgrub par byed pa yongs su dor bar sems pa'o //
translated: Non-desire is the thought to avoid the means of accomplishing suffering.

original: mngon par 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa de las kyang tha snyad 'jug par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: mngon par 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa de las kyang tha snyad 'jug par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: From that desire and non-desire, conventional usage occurs.

original: gzhung gi tshogs 'dis ni mngon sum gnyi ga'i yul la yang bde ba sgrub par byed pa nyid du ni dran pas yul du byas pa yin zhing dran pa la sogs pa'i rgyun gyis tha snyad bar du bcad pa ni gnyi ga la yang khyad par med do
analyzed: gzhung gi tshogs 'dis ni mngon sum gnyi ga'i yul la yang bde ba sgrub par byed pa nyid du ni dran pas yul du byas pa yin zhing dran pa la sogs pa'i rgyun gyis tha snyad bar du bcad pa ni gnyi ga la yang khyad par med do
translated: This collection of texts states that in the object of both direct perceptions, the means of accomplishing pleasure is made an object by memory, and there is no difference between the two in terms of the interruption of conventional usage by the continuum of memory and so on.

original: zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: This is what it says.

original: gal te mngon sum de la byed pa ma yin na 'o na ni de ltar nyams su myong bar 'gyur bar dran pa'i rgyur yang ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /üîΩrim pa @85a * //
analyzed: gal te mngon sum de la byed pa ma yin na 'o na ni de ltar nyams su myong bar 'gyur bar dran pa'i rgyur yang ji ltar 'gyur zhe na / rim pa @85a * //
translated: If direct perception does not function in that way, then how could it be the cause of memory that experiences it in that way?

original: bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: In order to teach the stages, it is explained:

original: dngos po'i ngo bo ni dngos po'i chos so //
analyzed: dngos po'i ngo bo ni dngos po'i chos so //
translated: The nature of a thing is the property of a thing.

original: don 'di yin te /
analyzed: don 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning is this:

original: 'di ni nyams su myong ba'i rang bzhin nyid yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni nyams su myong ba'i rang bzhin nyid yin te /
translated: This is the nature of experience.

original: 'di la 'thad pa ni cung zad kyang dgos pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di la 'thad pa ni cung zad kyang dgos pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: There is no need for any justification at all.

original: don 'di ni 'bras bu mthong ba las grub pa yin te /
analyzed: don 'di ni 'bras bu mthong ba las grub pa yin te /
translated: This meaning is established from seeing the effect.

original: rgyu med pa can ma yin zhing rgyu ma nges pa can yang ma yin pa de'i phyir 'di la 'thad pas ci zhig bya /
analyzed: rgyu med pa can ma yin zhing rgyu ma nges pa can yang ma yin pa de'i phyir 'di la 'thad pas ci zhig bya /
translated: Since it is not causeless and not uncertain with respect to the cause, what use is there for justification in this case?

original: yang de gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: yang de gang yin zhe na /
translated: Moreover, what is that?

original: bshad pa / gsal bar nyams su myong ba las te ches gsal ba'o //
analyzed: bshad pa / gsal bar nyams su myong ba las te ches gsal ba'o //
translated: It is said: From clear experience, that is, from very clear experience.

original: 'dis ni 'di skad bshad pa yin te /üîΩnyams su myong ba tsam gang yin pa de nyid kyis na dran pa'i nus pa 'jog pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di skad bshad pa yin te / nyams su myong ba tsam gang yin pa de nyid kyis na dran pa'i nus pa 'jog pa ma yin gyi /
translated: This is what is being said:üîΩThe mere experience itself does not establish the capacity for memory.

original: 'on kyang gsal bar nyams su myong bas dran pa'i nus pa bskyed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang gsal bar nyams su myong bas dran pa'i nus pa bskyed pa yin no //
translated: However, clear experience produces the capacity for memory.

original: dran pa bskyed par nus pa'i sa bon 'jog pa ste dran pa'i sa bon 'jog pa gang yin pa de ni gsal bar nyams su myong ba'i chos yin no //
analyzed: dran pa bskyed par nus pa'i sa bon 'jog pa ste dran pa'i sa bon 'jog pa gang yin pa de ni gsal bar nyams su myong ba'i chos yin no //
translated: The seed that is planted is the seed of memory, which is the phenomenon that is clearly experienced.

original: re zhig nyams su myong ba'i mthu las bag chags dang rjes su 'brel pa gang yin pa de ni yod pa yin la /
analyzed: re zhig nyams su myong ba'i mthu las bag chags dang rjes su 'brel pa gang yin pa de ni yod pa yin la /
translated: The latent impression that is connected to the experience that occurs at the time of the cause and result is present.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dus su 'byung ba'i nyams su myong bas ci 'dra ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa'i don dran pa'i bag chags bskyed pa de dang 'dra ba'i dngos po mthong ba las dran pa'i sa bon 'dis sad pa yin te ;
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dus su 'byung ba'i nyams su myong bas ci 'dra ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa'i don dran pa'i bag chags bskyed pa de dang 'dra ba'i dngos po mthong ba las dran pa'i sa bon 'dis sad pa yin te ;
translated: The seed of memory is activated by seeing an object that is similar to the object that was connected to the result of the experience that occurred at the time of the cause and result.

original: dran pa skyed pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dran pa skyed pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is consistent with the production of memory.

original: dran pa sad pa de las mngon par 'dod pa skyed par nus pa'i bag chags gang yin pa de 'jug ste /
analyzed: dran pa sad pa de las mngon par 'dod pa skyed par nus pa'i bag chags gang yin pa de 'jug ste /
translated: The latent impression that is capable of producing the desired result is activated.

original: 'bras bu bskyed pa la mngon du phyogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu bskyed pa la mngon du phyogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: It becomes manifest in the production of the result.

original: sa bon sad pa las dran pa yin zhing de las mngon par 'dod pa'i bag chags ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: sa bon sad pa las dran pa yin zhing de las mngon par 'dod pa'i bag chags ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: Is it not the case that memory arises from the activation of the seed, and from that, the latent impressions of what is desired?

original: dran pa'i dus nyid mngon par 'dod pa'i bag chags sad pa'i dus yin te /
analyzed: dran pa'i dus nyid mngon par 'dod pa'i bag chags sad pa'i dus yin te /
translated: The time of memory is the time of the activation of the latent impressions of what is desired.

original: dran pa de nyid bag chags sad pa'i bdag nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dran pa de nyid bag chags sad pa'i bdag nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that memory itself has the nature of the activation of the latent impressions.

original: mngon par 'dod pa'i bag chags sad pa de las kyang 'jug pa ste rab tu 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: mngon par 'dod pa'i bag chags sad pa de las kyang 'jug pa ste rab tu 'jug pa yin no //
translated: From the activation of the latent impressions of what is desired, there is engagement, that is, full engagement.

original: mngon par 'dod pa nyid las 'jug pa ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: mngon par 'dod pa nyid las 'jug pa ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: Isn‚Äôt engagement from what is desired?

original: mngon par 'dod pa yang 'jug pa thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba nyid kyis 'jug pa yin la /
analyzed: mngon par 'dod pa yang 'jug pa thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba nyid kyis 'jug pa yin la /
translated: What is desired is also engagement because it precedes all engagement.

original: de yang mngon par 'dod pa'i bag chags las 'jug pa nyid yin pa'i phyir 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: de yang mngon par 'dod pa'i bag chags las 'jug pa nyid yin pa'i phyir 'gal ba med do //
translated: And because that is engagement from the latent impressions of what is desired, there is no contradiction.

original: de'i phyir de ltar mngon sum gnyi ga'i 'jug @85b pa'i yang mngon sum gyi rjes su byung ba'i dran pa'i byed pas bar du chod pa dang ldan pa yin la yul dang dus dang rnam pa so sor nges pa'i dngos po 'jug pa'i yul du byed pa'i phyir
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar mngon sum gnyi ga'i 'jug @85b pa'i yang mngon sum gyi rjes su byung ba'i dran pa'i byed pas bar du chod pa dang ldan pa yin la yul dang dus dang rnam pa so sor nges pa'i dngos po 'jug pa'i yul du byed pa'i phyir
translated: Therefore, in this way, the object of memory that arises from both sense perceptions is also interrupted by the activity of memory that arises from sense perception, and it is the object of the activity of the object, time, and aspect that is ascertained individually.

original: mngon sum rang nyid 'jug par byed pa nyid yin pa la yang rnam par rtog pa med pa dang gzhan khyad par yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum rang nyid 'jug par byed pa nyid yin pa la yang rnam par rtog pa med pa dang gzhan khyad par yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, in terms of the activity of sense perception itself, there is no difference between it and conceptual cognition in terms of the absence of conceptualization.

original: de ltar na yang 'jug pa'i yul ni nges par byas pa yin la /
analyzed: de ltar na yang 'jug pa'i yul ni nges par byas pa yin la /
translated: However, the object of activity is ascertained.

original: nges par byas pa yang rtog pa med pa'i phyir mngon sum ma yin gyi /
analyzed: nges par byas pa yang rtog pa med pa'i phyir mngon sum ma yin gyi /
translated: And because that which is ascertained is not conceptual, it is not sense perception.

original: 'on kyang de'i stobs kyis bskyed pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang de'i stobs kyis bskyed pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin no //
translated: However, it is conceptual cognition that is generated by the power of that.

original: de'i phyir mngon sum dang rnam par rtog pa dag bsdoms pas tshad ma gcig tu 'gyur ba yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir mngon sum dang rnam par rtog pa dag bsdoms pas tshad ma gcig tu 'gyur ba yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, because sense perception and conceptual cognition are combined, there is one valid cognition.

original: mngon sum gcig pu nyid ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: mngon sum gcig pu nyid ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: But it is not just sense perception alone.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.

original: gang mngon sum tshad mar mi 'gyur ba zhen par byed pas ni tshad ma ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gang mngon sum tshad mar mi 'gyur ba zhen par byed pas ni tshad ma ma yin gyi /
translated: But it is not a means of valid knowledge because it causes one to adhere to what is not a direct perception.

original: 'on kyang thob par byed pas yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang thob par byed pas yin no //
translated: But it is a means of valid knowledge because it causes one to obtain.

original: thob par byed pa nyid kyang 'jug par byed pa las 'jug par byed pa yang 'jug pa'i yul rab tu ston pa las yin no //
analyzed: thob par byed pa nyid kyang 'jug par byed pa las 'jug par byed pa yang 'jug pa'i yul rab tu ston pa las yin no //
translated: And the cause of obtaining is from the cause of engaging, and the cause of engaging is from the cause of revealing the object of engagement.

original: 'jug pa'i yul yang nges par byas pa yin te /
analyzed: 'jug pa'i yul yang nges par byas pa yin te /
translated: And the object of engagement is ascertained.

original: de'i phyir thob pa'i yan lag 'jug pa'i yul zhen par byed pa ni tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir thob pa'i yan lag 'jug pa'i yul zhen par byed pa ni tshad ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the cause of obtaining is a means of valid knowledge because it causes one to adhere to the object of engagement.

original: de ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i mngon sum la yang bsam par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: de ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i mngon sum la yang bsam par bya ba yin te /
translated: This should also be considered in the case of conceptual direct perception.

original: skad cig ma nyid yin pa'i phyir mngon sum ldog pa na des byas pa'i zhen pa ldog pa yin no //
analyzed: skad cig ma nyid yin pa'i phyir mngon sum ldog pa na des byas pa'i zhen pa ldog pa yin no //
translated: Because it is momentary, when direct perception ceases, the adherence produced by it ceases.

original: de'i phyir zhen par ma byas pa 'jug pa'i yul ma yin pas thob par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir gang las thob pa'i yan lag 'jug pa'i yul zhen par byed /
analyzed: de'i phyir zhen par ma byas pa 'jug pa'i yul ma yin pas thob par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir gang las thob pa'i yan lag 'jug pa'i yul zhen par byed /
translated: Therefore, since it is not an object of engagement that is not adhered to, it is not to be obtained. From what would the cause of obtaining cause one to adhere to the object of engagement?

original: ci ste mngon sum snga ma las zhen par byed pa gzhan skye ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste mngon sum snga ma las zhen par byed pa gzhan skye ba yin no zhe na /
translated: But if you say that the other, which is the ascertainment from the prior perception, is born,

original: de ltar na yang rtsom pa dang mthar phyin pa'i 'dus khyab pa'i zhen pa bsdoms nas tshad ma gcig yin par 'gyur na dang po nyid ni 'dod pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na yang rtsom pa dang mthar phyin pa'i 'dus khyab pa'i zhen pa bsdoms nas tshad ma gcig yin par 'gyur na dang po nyid ni 'dod pa yin no //
translated: then, even so, the ascertainment which is the pervasion of the beginning and the end would be a single valid cognition, and that is what we maintain in the first place.

original: de'i phyir ji srid mngon sum gyi bya ba'i rjes su 'jug pa de srid du de nyid tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir ji srid mngon sum gyi bya ba'i rjes su 'jug pa de srid du de nyid tshad ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, as long as it is engaged in the activity of perception, it is a valid cognition.

original: mngon sum gyi bya ba ni mthong ba yin la /
analyzed: mngon sum gyi bya ba ni mthong ba yin la /
translated: The activity of perception is seeing.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i bya ba ni rtog pa yin te /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i bya ba ni rtog pa yin te /
translated: The activity of conceptualization is conceiving.

original: kho bo rtogs par byed kyi mthong ba ni ma yin no zhes rnam par rtog par byed pa ni nyams su myong ba nyid las nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kho bo rtogs par byed kyi mthong ba ni ma yin no zhes rnam par rtog par byed pa ni nyams su myong ba nyid las nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The conceptualization that ‚ÄúI am conceiving, not seeing‚Äù is ascertained from experience itself.

original: mngon sum gyi rjes su byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyi ni rang gi bya ba rtogs par byed pa spangs nas @86a * //
analyzed: mngon sum gyi rjes su byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyi ni rang gi bya ba rtogs par byed pa spangs nas @86a * //
translated: The conceptualizations that occur after perception, having abandoned their own activity of conceiving,

original: 'di mthong ba'i bya ba nyid kyi rnam pa'i rjes su 'brang bar byed de /
analyzed: 'di mthong ba'i bya ba nyid kyi rnam pa'i rjes su 'brang bar byed de /
translated: The activity of seeing is the very thing that is followed by the aspect.

original: de'i phyir ji srid zhen pa'i shes pa rnams la mthong ba zhes bya ba'i byed pa rjes su 'gro ba de srid du mngon sum gyi mthong ba'i 'du byed ma spangs par blta'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ji srid zhen pa'i shes pa rnams la mthong ba zhes bya ba'i byed pa rjes su 'gro ba de srid du mngon sum gyi mthong ba'i 'du byed ma spangs par blta'o //
translated: Thus, as long as the activity of seeing is followed by the consciousnesses that conceive, for that long the activity of seeing is not abandoned, and it is seen as direct perception.

original: de nyid kyi phyir de dag gis gang zhe na par byas pa de ni mngon sum nyid kyis zhen par byas pa yin la /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir de dag gis gang zhe na par byas pa de ni mngon sum nyid kyis zhen par byas pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, that which is conceived by them is conceived by direct perception itself.

original: zhen par byas pa la yang mngon sum nyid tshad ma yin gyi rnam par rtog pa de ni ma yin no //
analyzed: zhen par byas pa la yang mngon sum nyid tshad ma yin gyi rnam par rtog pa de ni ma yin no //
translated: And that which is conceived is direct perception itself, not conception.

original: zhen pa rnams rang gi byed pa la 'god pas na mngon sum rtog pa med pa la yang thob par byed pa'i yan lag zhen par byed pa khyad par med par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: zhen pa rnams rang gi byed pa la 'god pas na mngon sum rtog pa med pa la yang thob par byed pa'i yan lag zhen par byed pa khyad par med par shes par bya'o //
translated: Since those who conceive are engaged in their own activity, it should be understood that there is no difference between direct perception and conception in terms of the activity of conceiving.

original: dbang po'i mngon sum bshad nas gzhan gyis byas pa'i rtsod pa spang bar bzhed nas rgyu dang yul gyi bye brag gis yid kyi mngon sum gyi rang bzhin ston par byed do //
analyzed: dbang po'i mngon sum bshad nas gzhan gyis byas pa'i rtsod pa spang bar bzhed nas rgyu dang yul gyi bye brag gis yid kyi mngon sum gyi rang bzhin ston par byed do //
translated: Having explained sense-perception, in order to refute the objections of others, he shows the nature of mental perception by means of a distinction in cause and object.

original: yid ces bya ba ni yid tsam la brten pa gzung bar bya ste /
analyzed: yid ces bya ba ni yid tsam la brten pa gzung bar bya ste /
translated: The word ‚Äúmind‚Äù should be understood as referring to the mere mind,

original: rnam par shes pa thams cad yid nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa thams cad yid nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because all consciousness is mind.

original: kyang zhes bya ba ni mngon sum nyid du bsdu ba'o //üîΩdbang po'i shes pa de nyid ni de ma thag pa yang yin la /
analyzed: kyang zhes bya ba ni mngon sum nyid du bsdu ba'o // dbang po'i shes pa de nyid ni de ma thag pa yang yin la /
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù includes mental perception.üîΩThat sense-perception is immediate and a condition,

original: rkyen kyang yin te /
analyzed: rkyen kyang yin te /
translated: because it is the cause of the next moment of consciousness.

original: de las byung ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de las byung ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: That which arises from it is the object of the sense-perception.

original: 'dis ni rgyu'i khyad par bstan to //üîΩdbang po'i rnam par shes pa de'i don de ma thag pa ste /
analyzed: 'dis ni rgyu'i khyad par bstan to // dbang po'i rnam par shes pa de'i don de ma thag pa ste /
translated: This shows the distinction in cause.üîΩThat sense-perception is immediate to the object,

original: gang las bar chad med pa de 'dzin par byed pa ste /
analyzed: gang las bar chad med pa de 'dzin par byed pa ste /
translated: because it is the cause of the next moment of consciousness which apprehends it without interval.

original: 'dis ni yul gyi khyad par bstan te /
analyzed: 'dis ni yul gyi khyad par bstan te /
translated: This shows the distinction in object.

original: de lta bur gyur pa'i yid ni mngon sum du 'dod do //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa'i yid ni mngon sum du 'dod do //
translated: Such is mental perception, which is accepted as direct perception.

original: mngon sum smos pa med pa'i phyir de ltar ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: mngon sum smos pa med pa'i phyir de ltar ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: But is it not so that direct perception is not mentioned?

original: mngon sum zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: mngon sum zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The word ‚Äúdirect‚Äù is supplied.

original: 'di ni skabs yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni skabs yin no //
translated: This is the context.

original: sbyar ro zhes bya ba ni ltos te de la ltos pa nyid sbyar ba yin no //
analyzed: sbyar ro zhes bya ba ni ltos te de la ltos pa nyid sbyar ba yin no //
translated: ‚Äú Is supplied‚Äù means that it is supplied in the sense of dependence.

original: mdo nyid dgrol ba bshad pa ni /
analyzed: mdo nyid dgrol ba bshad pa ni /
translated: The sutra itself is explained as the solution:

original: dbang po'i shes pa'am 'ba' zhig mngon sum yin par ma zad kyi /
analyzed: dbang po'i shes pa'am 'ba' zhig mngon sum yin par ma zad kyi /
translated: Not only is the sense consciousness alone direct perception,

original: yid kyang mngon sum yin no //
analyzed: yid kyang mngon sum yin no //
translated: but the mental consciousness is also direct perception.

original: de'i khyad par ji lta bu zhig ce na /
analyzed: de'i khyad par ji lta bu zhig ce na /
translated: What is its distinction?

original: bshad pa / gang zhig dbang po'i rnam par shes pas bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: bshad pa / gang zhig dbang po'i rnam par shes pas bskyed pa'o //
translated: It is said: That which is produced by the sense consciousness.

original: dbang po'i shes pa nyid khyad par du byed pa 'dis ni shes pa'i rang bzhin du mtshungs pa yang yin la bar chad dang bral ba yang yin te /
analyzed: dbang po'i shes pa nyid khyad par du byed pa 'dis ni shes pa'i rang bzhin du mtshungs pa yang yin la bar chad dang bral ba yang yin te /
translated: By distinguishing the sense consciousness itself, it is the same in nature as consciousness, and it is also free from obstruction,

original: bar ma chod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bar ma chod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is unobstructed.

original: de nyid ni rkyen kyang yin te rkyen gyi don ni rgyu'i don to //
analyzed: de nyid ni rkyen kyang yin te rkyen gyi don ni rgyu'i don to //
translated: That itself is the condition, because the meaning of condition is the meaning of cause.

original: grub pa'i mtha' las grags pa'i @86b ming gis tha snyad du byas pa ni yid kyi mngon sum grub pa'i mtha' las grags par ston par byed pa ste /
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' las grags pa'i @86b ming gis tha snyad du byas pa ni yid kyi mngon sum grub pa'i mtha' las grags par ston par byed pa ste /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthe mind is the direct perceiver‚Äù is used as a conventional designation based on the name that is known in philosophical treatises.üîΩThe phrase ‚Äúthe mind is the direct perceiver‚Äù is used as a conventional designation based on the name that is known in philosophical treatises.üîΩThe phrase ‚Äúthe mind is the direct perceiver‚Äù is used as a conventional designation based on the name that is known in philosophical treatises.

original: yid kyi mngon sum sgrub pa la tshad ma gzhan ni btsal bar bya ba ma yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //üîΩ'o na ci'i phyir mngon sum gyi dbye bar bkod ce na /
analyzed: yid kyi mngon sum sgrub pa la tshad ma gzhan ni btsal bar bya ba ma yin no zhes bstan pa yin no // 'o na ci'i phyir mngon sum gyi dbye bar bkod ce na /
